will be spent on steel mold.
 Remaining will be used on safety tests and authentications
 (FCC, CE, TELEC).










Please feel free to contact us from our web site.
Tell us what you think about INUPATHY, 
and our vision. Please become a part of the team.


AND PLEASE SHARE! Tell your friend our story.

story:
Short Summary

I'm a writer, accredited coach and London-based entrepreneur. I've written a non-fiction book called What Went Wrong with Walter White? based on the lead character of the classic TV drama, Breaking Bad. 

Like many viewers, I was bowled over by the journey of Walter's character. For me, how it all started was as fascinating as how it went on to develop.  My work as a coach involves helping people deal with themes that the TV series explores. I decided to look at Walter's struggle as a lens for our own real-life challenges, hopes, dreams, and insecurities -- and what we can do about them. As I did this, I discovered a lot about Walter, but surprisingly even more about myself and the millions like me making sense of a fast-changing world.

What Went Wrong... is about how we value ourselves and create value for others against this landscape. It's focused on Walter and navigates Breaking Bad as a story, but it also takes a fresh look at how topics of identity, behaviour, creativity and freedom apply to all of us.

There was a lot of support for the book in a previous Kickstarter campaign earlier this month. We raised almost 70% of the funding goal, and wanted to give backers another opportunity to support on a more flexible platform. i.e. one that allows us to use what we do raise towards the book's production (as opposed to Kickstarter's all or nothing model, which it turns out wasn't the right fit.).

Who is Walter?

If you haven't seen the Breaking Bad TV series yet, here's a quick run-down on Walter: He's a struggling high school chemistry teacher, diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer. In a bid to secure his family's financial future before he dies, Walter turns to a life of crime, producing crystallized meth from an old RV, and selling it via his accomplice and former student, Jesse Pinkman.

Why this book?

There's a reason Breaking Bad is the highest rated drama in TV history: We all experience some degree of Walter’s circumstances. His problems are likely to confront each of us, if they haven't already: scarcity of money, health, time, control and meaning. On the flip side, the massive opportunities he couldn't see for himself are not always clear to us, in our own stories, either. That's why I've written this book. Not just to rehash a cautionary tale, but to explore what's possible in terms of career, lifestyle and enterprise for ourselves and for our families.

What Went Wrong with... Richard?

I love to write. Probably about as much as Walter loves Chemistry. Writing has always been central to adding value in my career. 

So, years ago, when I found myself stuck in a cubicle, unhappy, and not writing at all, “What went wrong?’ was a question I asked… a lot (and a lot less politely). Like Walter, without meaning to, I wound up in the place following a path that appeared to be safe-- sensible even, but mediocre. The results were telling: it showed up in my levels of happiness, satisfaction, and my general health. 

As one of my friends used to say, it's either choice or crisis that gets us out of these places. Like Walter, mine was the latter. The pragmatic career path I had tried to hold together, began to break apart. It wasn't dramatic, or even sudden like Walter’s earth-shattering news, but it led to a listless stagnation that stopped me performing at my best. 

So, I too purchased an RV and headed for the boonies… just kidding. One thing that was clear though: I had to find a vehicle and start experimenting with the thing that weren't working. it was definitely an “I am awake” season of life for me. I decided I wanted a better life for me and the people around me. Using insight and approaches I discuss in the book, I’ve...

  • Studied to be an accredited coach, graduating my class with merit.
  • Started businesses around my strengths, now with clients in the UK and Europe.
  • Produced courses showing others how to do the same.
  • Opened a coaching practice which has since helped many others make shift happen in their lives and businesses.
  • Made radical changes to my diet and overall health.
  • Started a beautiful family, to whom this book is dedicated.
  • Reached the finals of a national film contest

Today, my life is far from perfect, but I’m grateful it's also far from what it used to be. 

How you can help

Walter was right about one thing: "You and I will not make garbage", not if you can help it, and you can! Here's how:

By backing this book, you’re helping to lead the charge on an important mission: getting more from the staggering amounts of media we consume. I love entertainment, but I also love progress.  If it's true that we occupy an unprecedented place in history, then we all need to start experimenting: in career, in business, in relationships, and in our art. I've written this book to help people do just that.

Here's what the money will go towards...

  • Printing a limited edition physical book 
  • Payment for the book’s cover, layout and typesetting
  • Payment for the copy editing and proofing
  • Producing and fulfilling the fat stacks of rewards 
  • Kickstarter fees & taxes 
  • Some shipping costs

What's the timeline? When do I get my goodies?

I'm aiming to ship rewards to backers by the last week of September 2015.. The book is currently in its final major edit. Once the campaign is funded, it’ll go of for copy-editing and typesetting. Here's the estimated timeline...

  • Early-June - Book cover design (done!) 
  • Early-August: Richard finishes writing final draft. 
  • Late-August: Editing and typesetting of manuscript finished, sent to printer 
  • Mid-September: Backer names published on website thank-you page (optional)
  • Mid-September: Digital editions sent to Kickstarter backers 
  • Mid-September: 21-day video coaching program starts for coaching program backers. 
  • Late-September: Digital editions of book (Kindle, iPad) sent to backers. 
  • Late-Septmber: Printing done; start shipping print book.

Risks & Challenges

Since most of the backers of the project have already been found, this Indiegogo campaign involves much less risk than the Kickstarter one.

Timeline: This second crowd funding round is evidence that sometimes things take a little longer than usual, but once funded I’m not anticipating any major delays with delivery. This time around there should be less time spent promoting the crowd-fund and more focus on the production timeline.

Quality & Budget: I want to make sure that the book can still be shipped without compromising on its quality, If necessary, I can trim a few items from the original budget such as the book website by developing it myself. 

One useful thing that came out of the previous Kickstarter campaign was data about what people wanted most: There was less demand for some rewards that I’d budgeted for such as posters, so this time there’s likely to be some cost savings there, too.

Funding Amounts: The main costs for the book are production costs (editing, typesetting, proofing, design). If I don't reach the entire goal, here's what will happen at different levels of funding: 

  • £1500-£2280 raised: This is in the neighbourhood of what we raised previously, it will cover the fixed costs of production. 
  • £1000-£1500 raised:  The editing time I’ve costed for above is not the cheapest - I wanted to find a solid, experienced editor familiar with the subject matter.  At this level of funding I'll have to source a more affordable production team for (editing, typesetting, proofing).
  • £500-£1000 raised: In this unlikely event, I’ll keep the campaign running for a longer period, until one of the above funding brackets is reached.
Other Ways You Can Help

If you really can't contribute, you can still help:

  • Help me get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks for your support.

Special thanks to the creative contributors  

This project wouldn't have been possible without the generosity of so many...

  • Paul Burt - Video  
  • Si Cliff - Music 
  • Mercy Smartt - Sound Editing

Kind thanks to City University, F.Mondays Coffee Shop for allowing us to shoot the vid, The Heisenberg Chronicles for their help, Litlast Design (for all your designs), Cara & Louie (Walter White Painting above), Leonardo González for Cover Design; to everyone who commented, voted and gave me their two cents on crafting the book.

Like many viewers, I was bowled over by the journey of Walter's character. For me, how it all started was as fascinating as how it went on to develop.  My work as a coach involves helping people deal with themes that the TV series explores. I decided to look at Walter's struggle as a lens for our own real-life challenges, hopes, dreams, and insecurities -- and what we can do about them. As I did this, I discovered a lot about Walter, but surprisingly even more about myself and the millions like me making sense of a fast-changing world.
What Went Wrong... is about how we value ourselves and create value for others against this landscape. It's focused on Walter and navigates Breaking Bad as a story, but it also takes a fresh look at how topics of identity, behaviour, creativity and freedom apply to all of us.
There was a lot of support for the book in a previous Kickstarter campaign earlier this month. We raised almost 70% of the funding goal, and wanted to give backers another opportunity to support on a more flexible platform. i.e. one that allows us to use what we do raise towards the book's production (as opposed to Kickstarter's all or nothing model, which it turns out wasn't the right fit.).
Who is Walter?
If you haven't seen the Breaking Bad TV series yet, here's a quick run-down on Walter: He's a struggling high school chemistry teacher, diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer. In a bid to secure his family's financial future before he dies, Walter turns to a life of crime, producing crystallized meth from an old RV, and selling it via his accomplice and former student, Jesse Pinkman.


Why this book?
There's a reason Breaking Bad is the highest rated drama in TV history: We all experience some degree of Walter’s circumstances. His problems are likely to confront each of us, if they haven't already: scarcity of money, health, time, control and meaning. On the flip side, the massive opportunities he couldn't see for himself are not always clear to us, in our own stories, either. That's why I've written this book. Not just to rehash a cautionary tale, but to explore what's possible in terms of career, lifestyle and enterprise for ourselves and for our families.
What Went Wrong with... Richard?
I love to write. Probably about as much as Walter loves Chemistry. Writing has always been central to adding value in my career. So, years ago, when I found myself stuck in a cubicle, unhappy, and not writing at all, “What went wrong?’ was a question I asked… a lot (and a lot less politely). Like Walter, without meaning to, I wound up in the place following a path that appeared to be safe-- sensible even, but mediocre. The results were telling: it showed up in my levels of happiness, satisfaction, and my general health. 
As one of my friends used to say, it's either choice or crisis that gets us out of these places. Like Walter, mine was the latter. The pragmatic career path I had tried to hold together, began to break apart. It wasn't dramatic, or even sudden like Walter’s earth-shattering news, but it led to a listless stagnation that stopped me performing at my best. 
So, I too purchased an RV and headed for the boonies… just kidding. One thing that was clear though: I had to find a vehicle and start experimenting with the thing that weren't working. it was definitely an “I am awake” season of life for me. I decided I wanted a better life for me and the people around me. Using insight and approaches I discuss in the book, I’ve...

Studied to be an accredited coach, graduating my class with merit.
Started businesses around my strengths, now with clients in the UK and Europe.
Produced courses showing others how to do the same.
Opened a coaching practice which has since helped many others make shift happen in their lives and businesses.
Made radical changes to my diet and overall health.
Started a beautiful family, to whom this book is dedicated.
Reached the finals of a national film contest

Today, my life is far from perfect, but I’m grateful it's also far from what it used to be. 
How you can help
Walter was right about one thing: "You and I will not make garbage", not if you can help it, and you can! Here's how:
By backing this book, you’re helping to lead the charge on an important mission: getting more from the staggering amounts of media we consume. I love entertainment, but I also love progress.  If it's true that we occupy an unprecedented place in history, then we all need to start experimenting: in career, in business, in relationships, and in our art. I've written this book to help people do just that.
Here's what the money will go towards...

Printing a limited edition physical book 
Payment for the book’s cover, layout and typesetting
Payment for the copy editing and proofing
Producing and fulfilling the fat stacks of rewards 
Kickstarter fees & taxes 
Some shipping costs


What's the timeline? When do I get my goodies?
I'm aiming to ship rewards to backers by the last week of September 2015.. The book is currently in its final major edit. Once the campaign is funded, it’ll go of for copy-editing and typesetting. Here's the estimated timeline...

Early-June - Book cover design (done!) 
Early-August: Richard finishes writing final draft. 
Late-August: Editing and typesetting of manuscript finished, sent to printer 
Mid-September: Backer names published on website thank-you page (optional)
Mid-September: Digital editions sent to Kickstarter backers 
Mid-September: 21-day video coaching program starts for coaching program backers. 
Late-September: Digital editions of book (Kindle, iPad) sent to backers. 
Late-Septmber: Printing done; start shipping print book.


Risks & Challenges



Since most of the backers of the project have already been found, this Indiegogo campaign involves much less risk than the Kickstarter one.
Timeline: This second crowd funding round is evidence that sometimes things take a little longer than usual, but once funded I’m not anticipating any major delays with delivery. This time around there should be less time spent promoting the crowd-fund and more focus on the production timeline.
Quality & Budget: I want to make sure that the book can still be shipped without compromising on its quality, If necessary, I can trim a few items from the original budget such as the book website by developing it myself. 
One useful thing that came out of the previous Kickstarter campaign was data about what people wanted most: There was less demand for some rewards that I’d budgeted for such as posters, so this time there’s likely to be some cost savings there, too.
Funding Amounts: The main costs for the book are production costs (editing, typesetting, proofing, design). If I don't reach the entire goal, here's what will happen at different levels of funding: 


£1500-£2280 raised: This is in the neighbourhood of what we raised previously, it will cover the fixed costs of production. 
£1000-£1500 raised:  The editing time I’ve costed for above is not the cheapest - I wanted to find a solid, experienced editor familiar with the subject matter.  At this level of funding I'll have to source a more affordable production team for (editing, typesetting, proofing).
£500-£1000 raised: In this unlikely event, I’ll keep the campaign running for a longer period, until one of the above funding brackets is reached.




Other Ways You Can Help

 If you really can't contribute, you can still help:  Help me get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools!   Thanks for your support.Special thanks to the creative contributors  This project wouldn't have been possible without the generosity of so many...

Paul Burt - Video  

Si Cliff - Music 
Mercy Smartt - Sound Editing
Kind thanks to City University, F.Mondays Coffee Shop for allowing us to shoot the vid, The Heisenberg Chronicles for their help, Litlast Design (for all your designs), Cara & Louie (Walter White Painting above), Leonardo González for Cover Design; to everyone who commented, voted and gave me their two cents on crafting the book.

story:
AFC Campaign Summary

First and foremost, thanks for stopping by!


A little personal background…

My name is Jason Kucharik, the creator of Authors For Change (or AFC), and I’m the author of VOK or Variable Operations Knowledge.  Before I explain what AFC or VOK is all about, I’d like to take a minute to tell you about myself.  Three years ago I found my passion in writing and have been working to develop my craft ever since.  My first book was part of a fantasy trilogy I created titled Fear Your Fate.  After that started to get some attention on Wattpad, I co-authored a science fiction book called Project Aspire with three other authors, one of whom was Taran Matharu, the first male author to receive a publishing deal from his success on Wattpad.  Shortly after that I started writing VOK, my first military science fiction book.  A few months ago, Fledging, my first try at a short story was published as part of an anthology called Brave New Girls which centers around strong, young, female protagonists. The purpose of this anthology is to raise money for a scholarship fund through the Society of Women Engineers. 


What’s is Authors For Change? 

Authors For Change is an organization that’s very dear to my heart.  Author For Change will use traditional media, social media, and good old fashioned word of mouth to spread the work of self-published authors who want to create change in the world.  Everyone wants to make money doing what they love, but Authors For Change is about more than just padding your pocket; it's about creating real change.  The initial wave of authors who are participating in Authors For Change have picked the following non-profits/charities for their book's proceeds... 

To Write Love On Her Arms  https://twloha.com/

It Gets Better Project​ http://www.itgetsbetter.org/ 

Society of Women Engineers​  http://societyofwomenengineers.swe.org/

 Feeding America​  http://www.feedingamerica.org/

Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF)​  https://www.eff.org/



The Impact

The AFC campaign is about myself and others using our talents to create an organization that will impact the world.  Brainstorming ways to market VOK is how I came up with the idea of Authors For Change.  I want to take my talents and use them for positive change instead of just furthering my own career.  With your support, we can make that happen.  With your support, other authors can contribute to the Authors For Change campaign and we can raise a hell of a lot of money to support charities that fight depression, feed the hungry, fight for equality, help veterans in need, fight against the cruelty of animals, support research against terminal conditions, and many, many, more.  With your support, Authors For Change can be the start of something great and help create real change in the world. 


How does it work?

Authors For Change is still in the very early stages, and this Indie GoGo campaign is being done to raise money to get it off the ground.  The first campaign will be done with some authors that I personally know, to see if the program will not only work, but to iron out any kinks that will arise.  After the first campaign is done, we will move on to a secondary campaign with more authors, then a third, and so on.  The general idea is this...

Authors who wish to work with Authors For Change will submit a portion of their work, and a short explanation as to what charity they'd like to support and why for review.  If picked, participating authors will sign a publishing contract with Authors For Change for the duration of the program.  Authors For Change will work with the charities that the authors have picked to make them aware of who we are and have them spread the word about the books in our program.  For spreading the word about our work, each author participating in the program will donate 100% of the proceeds from the first thousand copies of their work to the charity of their choice.  After the initial thousand copies, authors are required to continue donating at least 20% of their proceeds to the charity of their choice for one whole year.  They may choose to donate more, or continue donating past the one year mark if they so choose.  A small percentage of sales is goes into Authors For Change to help cover operating costs and the continuation of the program.  The remaining amount of the sales go to the author.

We only work with people who are committed to change

Authors For Change is creating a movement where people can use their passions to help those in need.  If making a quick buck is your goal, then Authors For Change is not for you.  Our organization will allow authors to pool their networks and utilize the charity's networks to get exposure and thus create a much larger fan base for their work than would be possible on their own, but that is secondary to our primary goal.  We want to prove that there are still plenty of great people in this world who wish to support causes that offer hope and change for those who need it.  The authors we’re looking to work with are constantly asking what else they can do to help, not how much money they’ll make.  Becoming a contributor in the AFC campaign is about helping myself and others create an organization that plans to change the world for the better, as best we can, with the talents we have.


What We Need & What You Get

The number of individuals interested in supporting Authors For Change just continues to grow and I’m looking to raise $5,000 to help get things off the ground.  I'm sure you're wondering what the proceeds are going towards, so let me break it down…

$500 Legitimizing Authors For Change – At this point, Authors For Change is merely an idea, but myself and a core group of members I’ve recruited are itching to make it a reality.  We’re a collection of authors, artists, and editors who want to become a force for good in the world, and we need your help.  Step one to making that happen is legitimizing Authors For Change as an organization.  Authors For Change will start out in the form of an LCC with contracts written up for the participating authors.  This $500 will be used to hire a lawyer to set up the LLC and review the contracts we plan to set in place.  The main goal in the future is to make AFC a non-profit organization, but the flexibility of an LLC will allow us to get started faster and figure out what works and what doesn't.

$1,200 for Brand Creation – Brand recognition is huge for any new organization.  After making AFC a legitimate organization, we’ll be hiring a professional graphic artist to create a professional brand in the form of a logo and website.  It is key that charities understand how serious AFC is and how serious the people supporting it are. 

$2,200 Editing – VOK is the first book to support Authors For Change, so ensuring VOK is available as a professional product is my number one concern.  My father always taught me that if you are going to take the time to do something, then you better damn well do it right.  The end product of VOK that I’ll be publishing is light years ahead of the pre-edited copy that’s available on Wattpad, making it a very strong forerunning to drive attention toward AFC.  

$1,100 Indie GoGo Campaign Promotional Costs– This is to cover the creation of all the promotional prizes offered in the Indie GoGo campaign.     

Additional Funds Raised - Any additional funds raised from the campaign will be put into Authors For Change to help make it more successful, this includes website upkeep, online or traditional marketing, and more.  The $1,500 that I've allocated for its creation is just the beginning.    


Risks & Challenges

As with any project or organization, there are risks and challenges involved.  With Authors For Change it really comes down to funding.  If AFC is going to approach these charities in a professional manner, then it needs to legalized, branded, and have information about the program clearly laid out and available.  Legal documents need to be drawn up before we reach out to the charities we hope to work with.  If VOK is to be the first book to launch Authors For Change into reality, then it needs to be properly edited.  At this current time, anyone involved in AFC is volunteering because they want to help make a difference, and believe in the movement.  Should the first official AFC campaign of books go well, then I shall reassess the needs and proceed accordingly.  My long term goal is to run AFC full time.     

I know that AFC will be a success, there’s no doubt in my mind.  It’s only a matter of time and dedication.  I’m asking you to trust in my desire to do good, and trust in my vision as the people already working with AFC have.  With your help, we can ensure Authors For Change will become a reality, affording it the opportunity to help more people as soon as possible. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you can't contribute, and trust me I understand that.  As someone taking to Indie GoGo to help fund an idea, I know what it’s like to be tight on funds, but that doesn't mean that you can't help.

I need you to spread the word about Authors For Change and VOK.  Share this link on Twitter and Facebook.  Take a screenshot of the campaign and upload it to Instragram.  Tell others by word of mouth, or any means possible.  Whenever it’s with an online platform, please remember to use the hashtags #VOK, #AFC, and #indiegogo to help people find it easier. 

If you can’t contribute, all that I ask is you take a few seconds to help spread the word about what I’m trying to accomplish.  Thank you for your contributions, time, and overall help in making my campaign successful!


VOK's description and what readers are saying about it ...

Earth has burned; my people made sure the humans paid for their insolence in the final days of the Blood War, but as it turns out the universe is pretty freaking huge and they weren’t the only threat.  Not by a long shot.

I’m an Alpha, one of the most feared special operations soldiers in the universe.  Born out of blood, I am the eyes and ears of the High Order and, when need be, their unflinching reaper.  I do not yield, I do not bow, I do not fail.  Ever.

For centuries our loyalty was unquestionable, but my partner and I uncovered a dark secret about our past that calls into question our entire lives.  The High Order trained us to be the most intelligent, ruthless, and feared soldiers ever created…they’re going to regret that.

(Many readers are commenting on their phones, some with English as a second language, therefore I’ve corrected comment grammatical issues for easier reading.  Some are quite lengthy and have been cut down to prevent spoilers.  All of these readers enjoyed a pre-edited copy of VOK, all grammatical/story issues have been fixed in the final edition)

“This is the kind of thing that reminds you how awesome books can be.” - CooperLane

“Love this.  Reading Sci-Fi 50 years.  This story is up there.” - ThomasGorham

“Really good read, amazing voice.  Reads like Starship Troopers, Armor, and Old Man’s War, which are the classics of sci-fi military, so if it gives me that vibe, you are doing a lot of things right.” - MichaelBacera

“Your writing reminds me of Orson Scott Card who was my favorite fantasy writer when I was young.” – laura_usa1

“Love the J.R.R. Tolkien reference!  Personally I’m enjoying this better than Ender’s Game!” - ThatCleverGuy

“Love it!  I’m so into this story.  Grammatical errors aside, it’s got the fast pace of a Dan Brown thriller but with the detailed description and world building.  It reads like a published novel, and I’m actually finding myself looking forward to when I get off work so I can read.” – Nandie_T

“Love what you’re doing with vampires.  Ideas like yours keep the genre alive.  I’m still smiling over the gospel of Tolkien and Guillermo the revelator J” – LynnS13

“I love your universe!  Reads a bit like…like imaging a Clive Barker game or something, haha.  I mean that as a compliment!  Splendid!” - Blinksy

“I think I have finally found a book that has met my finicky nature of dystopians on here, not feeling believable.  My God this book sucked me in with the first paragraph!” - poorly

"This is one of the best stories I’ve ever read!  It’s science fiction, but nobody expects there to be “Vampires”.  It’s surprising you put them into space, normally they’re in middle age novels or twilight.” -exiledgoddess

“It’s so nice to see something where vampires aren’t blood-thirsty monsters but “normal” people. Keep it up, your book is just awesome!” - exiledgoddess

“I personally don’t care for vampire stories, that being said, I found the first chapter well written and riveting.  Put another way, I will continue to read your book.” - libraGuy

“I am not a big reader and my favorite book series is the inheritance cycle for Eragon.  This is literally something I have been looking for in a book for a while now.  I pretty picky on themes and the story lines of books as well as writing styles, but yours captured me so quickly.” - JessicaTunny

“An amazing book, I hate to read, but this book is great.” - QuintonEason

"This is better than a movie.” - Tomkitu

"Oh, hell yes.  That line gave me goosebumps.” - _Rain_of_Fire_

“Beautiful…just beautiful.  Do we get a motion picture for this, too?” – Gabriel_Pope

“Great mix of action and comedy!” – Mogford

“Hooked on the first chapter! Love it!” – HariRose19

"Incredibly well written.  Voted.” - cdjameson

“I love this!  Finally a book that has some attitude :-p I love it” - HeadShotZombie

“This has been the best read on this site.  As a writer you know how to put a great story together!” – skyman49

“Best story I’ve read in a while.  Up reading instead of sleeping.  Love the way it came together!  Can’t wait to read more.” - jeffinman

“HOLY WOW.  I am going out of my mind, can’t put it down.  Need to sleep but can’t seem to be able to make myself put it down, it’s just that good.” – donaldmartin33671

“Bro, this is amazing shit.  Sorry, that was coarse :D but, I’m typically a Fantasy person but I have CONVERTED.  This is pretty awesome.” - BeyondNothing

“Reading is so magical, what makes it better is when you find books like these that just takes your imagination to heights you don’t often get.  Loving it Jason.” – papijace

“I really enjoy this story.  Awesome character development.  Voted” - daniellecavinder

“Omg this is amazing haha.  Straight up blew my mind!  You’re an amazing writer, keep it up :D” - turtasauce

"I've got to say, grammar, no grammar what freaking ever.  Haven’t put it down since I started.  Your imagination and little quips, grand job!!!! A day in your head would be marvelous.” – susan0844421306

“Beautifully written!  I swear I’m the main character now!” - fierygoldgirl

“HOLY SHIT!! THIS IS FREAKING AWESOMEEE! The way you managed to connect everything together is truly brilliant!” -   fierygoldgirl

"Jason, you're amazing bro.  I don't even like reading and I can't put my phone down.  I look forward to the next chapter.” – 02119Chubb

"Aden is the truth.  You did a great job developing these characters, I can’t stop reading.” – 02119Chubb

“This story gets better and better each chapter.  I don’t know how much more plot twists I can take!  Awesome book man!!!” – DanyelleSilver

“Love this phrase.  Fabulous word craft.” – Athena_owl

“Holy crap!  That got intense quick, I love it.” – ajnunez1271

“I can’t write a proper review…my mind has been blown by this chapter” - JoeStorm

“I love the change from tense reconnaissance mission, to break-neck pace action sequence!!!!! It’s amazing!!!!!” – Master_General

"This is freaking genius." - TantheMan

“This has to be one of the most interesting starts to a story that I have ever read.  Absolutely riveting!! Ingenious.” – MoonAngelz

“Loved this.  I’m hooked and eager to continue one.  You’ve got a lot of good things going on here.” – kevacho

“Okay, you just blew my mind.  Wow what a freaking awesome first chapter, I’m already hooked and looking forward to the rest of the book.  This should be good.” – DonavonHall

“Awesome story, Jason.  Started reading it at work yesterday and I almost got into trouble because I couldn’t put it down.” - JeanSwart

"Really enjoying this.  Characters are interesting, fun and believable (for hulking great space vampires).  Info dumping and background is done in a good way too…good stuff.  Consider me impressed.” - mobewan

“Wow…sometimes you just know that there is no way that you could get hooked on something in the first paragraph, but you my friend have landed me, hook, line, and sinker.  Keep it up…great read.” – donaldmartin33671

“Exquisite, creative, I’m intrigued already.” – edias323

"OH MY GOD!!!!" - FinalHeir

“AHHHHHHHHHHH! Holy crap man!” - OwenCooper

“I like you balance between description and plot advancement, a ration I am still trying to find my perfect balance in.” - ParisL

“This was so much fun!  I loved the references and the actions.” – Cats_Paw

“I don’t like when stories jump back and forth in time.  In this case, I see why it does and I have to admit, it works.  Great story so far.” -hdjerry

“In the event that you haven’t heard yet, this is a damn good story.” - RobertGoode

 [SK1]What does this J means and the next quote?

is light years ahead of the pre-edited copy that’s available on Wattpad, making
it a very strong forerunning to drive attention toward AFC.  

$1,100
Indie GoGo Campaign Promotional Costs– This is to cover the creation of all the
promotional prizes offered in the Indie GoGo campaign.     

Additional
Funds Raised - Any
additional funds raised from the campaign will be put into Authors For Change
to help make it more successful, this includes website upkeep, online or
traditional marketing, and more.  The $1,500 that I've allocated for its
creation is just the beginning.    
Risks
& Challenges
As
with any project or organization, there are risks and challenges
involved.  With Authors For Change it really comes down to funding.  If AFC is going to approach these charities
in a professional manner, then it needs to legalized, branded, and have
information about the program clearly laid out and available.  Legal documents need to be drawn up before we
reach out to the charities we hope to work with.  If VOK is to be the first book to launch
Authors For Change into reality, then it needs to be properly edited.  At this current time, anyone involved in AFC is volunteering because they want to help make a difference, and believe in the movement.  Should the first official AFC campaign of books go well, then I shall reassess the needs and proceed accordingly.  My long term goal is to run AFC full time.     
I know that
AFC will be a success, there’s no doubt in my mind.  It’s only a matter of
time and dedication.  I’m asking you to
trust in my desire to do good, and trust in my vision as the people already
working with AFC have.  With your help,
we can ensure Authors For Change will become a reality, affording it the
opportunity to help more people as soon as possible. 

Other
Ways You Can Help
Some
of you can't contribute, and trust me I understand that.  As someone
taking to Indie GoGo to help fund an idea, I know what it’s like to be tight on
funds, but that doesn't mean that you can't help.
I
need you to spread the word about Authors For Change and VOK.  Share this
link on Twitter and Facebook.  Take a screenshot of the campaign and
upload it to Instragram.  Tell others by word of mouth, or any means
possible.  Whenever it’s with an online
platform, please remember to use the hashtags #VOK, #AFC, and #indiegogo to
help people find it easier. 
If
you can’t contribute, all that I ask is you take a few seconds to help spread
the word about what I’m trying to accomplish.  Thank you for your contributions,
time, and overall help in making my campaign successful!
VOK's
description and what readers are saying about it ...

Earth has burned; my people made sure the
humans paid for their insolence in the final days of the Blood War, but as it
turns out the universe is pretty freaking huge and they weren’t the only
threat.  Not by a long shot.
I’m an Alpha, one of the
most feared special operations soldiers in the universe.  Born out of
blood, I am the eyes and ears of the High Order and, when need be, their
unflinching reaper.  I do not yield, I do not bow, I do not fail.
 Ever. 
For centuries our
loyalty was unquestionable, but my partner and I uncovered a dark secret about
our past that calls into question our entire lives.  The High Order
trained us to be the most intelligent, ruthless, and feared soldiers ever
created…they’re going to regret that. 

(Many
readers are commenting on their phones, some with English as a second language,
therefore I’ve corrected comment grammatical issues for easier reading. 
Some are quite lengthy and have been cut down to prevent spoilers.  All of
these readers enjoyed a pre-edited copy of VOK, all grammatical/story issues
have been fixed in the final edition)
“This
is the kind of thing that reminds you how awesome books can be.” - CooperLane
“Love
this.  Reading Sci-Fi 50 years.  This story is up there.” -
ThomasGorham
“Really
good read, amazing voice.  Reads like Starship Troopers, Armor, and Old
Man’s War, which are the classics of sci-fi military, so if it gives me that
vibe, you are doing a lot of things right.” - MichaelBacera
“Your
writing reminds me of Orson Scott Card who was my favorite fantasy writer when
I was young.” – laura_usa1
“Love
the J.R.R. Tolkien reference!  Personally I’m enjoying this better than
Ender’s Game!” - ThatCleverGuy
“Love
it!  I’m so into this story.  Grammatical errors aside, it’s got the
fast pace of a Dan Brown thriller but with the detailed description and world
building.  It reads like a published novel, and I’m actually finding
myself looking forward to when I get off work so I can read.” – Nandie_T
“Love
what you’re doing with vampires.  Ideas like yours keep the genre
alive.  I’m still smiling over the gospel of Tolkien and Guillermo the
revelator J” – LynnS13
“I
love your universe!  Reads a bit like…like imaging a Clive Barker game or
something, haha.  I mean that as a compliment!  Splendid!” - Blinksy
“I
think I have finally found a book that has met my finicky nature of dystopians
on here, not feeling believable.  My God this book sucked me in with the
first paragraph!” - poorly
"This
is one of the best stories I’ve ever read!  It’s science fiction, but
nobody expects there to be “Vampires”.  It’s surprising you put them into
space, normally they’re in middle age novels or twilight.” -exiledgoddess
“It’s
so nice to see something where vampires aren’t blood-thirsty monsters but
“normal” people. Keep it up, your book is just awesome!” - exiledgoddess
“I
personally don’t care for vampire stories, that being said, I found the first
chapter well written and riveting.  Put another way, I will continue to
read your book.” - libraGuy
“I
am not a big reader and my favorite book series is the inheritance cycle for
Eragon.  This is literally something I have been looking for in a book for
a while now.  I pretty picky on themes and the story lines of books as
well as writing styles, but yours captured me so quickly.” - JessicaTunny
“An
amazing book, I hate to read, but this book is great.” - QuintonEason
"This
is better than a movie.” - Tomkitu
"Oh,
hell yes.  That line gave me goosebumps.” - _Rain_of_Fire_
“Beautiful…just
beautiful.  Do we get a motion picture for this, too?” – Gabriel_Pope
“Great
mix of action and comedy!” – Mogford
“Hooked
on the first chapter! Love it!” – HariRose19
"Incredibly
well written.  Voted.” - cdjameson
“I
love this!  Finally a book that has some attitude :-p I love it” -
HeadShotZombie
“This
has been the best read on this site.  As a writer you know how to put a
great story together!” – skyman49
“Best
story I’ve read in a while.  Up reading instead of sleeping.  Love
the way it came together!  Can’t wait to read more.” - jeffinman
“HOLY
WOW.  I am going out of my mind, can’t put it down.  Need to sleep
but can’t seem to be able to make myself put it down, it’s just that good.” –
donaldmartin33671
“Bro,
this is amazing shit.  Sorry, that was coarse :D but, I’m typically a
Fantasy person but I have CONVERTED.  This is pretty awesome.” -
BeyondNothing
“Reading
is so magical, what makes it better is when you find books like these that just
takes your imagination to heights you don’t often get.  Loving it Jason.”
– papijace
“I
really enjoy this story.  Awesome character development.  Voted” -
daniellecavinder
“Omg
this is amazing haha.  Straight up blew my mind!  You’re an amazing
writer, keep it up :D” - turtasauce
"I've
got to say, grammar, no grammar what freaking ever.  Haven’t put it down
since I started.  Your imagination and little quips, grand job!!!! A day
in your head would be marvelous.” – susan0844421306
“Beautifully
written!  I swear I’m the main character now!” - fierygoldgirl
“HOLY
SHIT!! THIS IS FREAKING AWESOMEEE! The way you managed to connect everything
together is truly brilliant!” -   fierygoldgirl
"Jason,
you're amazing bro.  I don't even like reading and I can't put my phone
down.  I look forward to the next chapter.” – 02119Chubb
"Aden
is the truth.  You did a great job developing these characters, I can’t
stop reading.” – 02119Chubb
“This
story gets better and better each chapter.  I don’t know how much more
plot twists I can take!  Awesome book man!!!” – DanyelleSilver
“Love
this phrase.  Fabulous word craft.” – Athena_owl
“Holy
crap!  That got intense quick, I love it.” – ajnunez1271
“I
can’t write a proper review…my mind has been blown by this chapter” - JoeStorm
“I
love the change from tense reconnaissance mission, to break-neck pace action
sequence!!!!! It’s amazing!!!!!” – Master_General
"This
is freaking genius." - TantheMan
“This
has to be one of the most interesting starts to a story that I have ever
read.  Absolutely riveting!! Ingenious.” – MoonAngelz
“Loved
this.  I’m hooked and eager to continue one.  You’ve got a lot of good
things going on here.” – kevacho
“Okay,
you just blew my mind.  Wow what a freaking awesome first chapter, I’m
already hooked and looking forward to the rest of the book.  This should
be good.” – DonavonHall
“Awesome
story, Jason.  Started reading it at work yesterday and I almost got into
trouble because I couldn’t put it down.” - JeanSwart
"Really
enjoying this.  Characters are interesting, fun and believable (for
hulking great space vampires).  Info dumping and background is done in a
good way too…good stuff.  Consider me impressed.” - mobewan
“Wow…sometimes
you just know that there is no way that you could get hooked on something in
the first paragraph, but you my friend have landed me, hook, line, and
sinker.  Keep it up…great read.” – donaldmartin33671
“Exquisite,
creative, I’m intrigued already.” – edias323
"OH
MY GOD!!!!" - FinalHeir
“AHHHHHHHHHHH!
Holy crap man!” - OwenCooper
“I
like you balance between description and plot advancement, a ration I am still
trying to find my perfect balance in.” - ParisL
“This
was so much fun!  I loved the references and the actions.” – Cats_Paw
“I
don’t like when stories jump back and forth in time.  In this case, I see
why it does and I have to admit, it works.  Great story so far.” -hdjerry
“In
the event that you haven’t heard yet, this is a damn good story.” - RobertGoode

story:
Click Here for the English version
Français

Quelle est l'origine du projet?

Le journal La Presse du 14 novembre 2014 (p. 7) a dressé un bilan de la situation philanthropique au Québec. De 2008 à 2014, le secteur philanthropique du Québec a accusé « un manque à gagner de quelque 500 millions de dollars ».

Interrogée à ce sujet par le journal La Presse, Danielle Poulin, membre du comité exécutif de l’Association des professionnels en gestion philanthropique (APGP), a fait le bilan diagnostic suivant :

« La tarte des dons [provenant d’entreprises] n’augmente pas. L’argent est dans les mains des individus. Or comme l’État est en décroissance, on a une culture philanthropique à développer au Québec.»

L’équipe de Toastzr a finalement compris qu’au Québec les gens donnent, mais attendent quelque chose en échange. Notre équipe a alors imaginé le concept « un toast à la cause! » Le concept est basé sur la prémisse que manger étant culturel, le partage de repas pour une bonne cause peut faire tomber les barrières humaines tout en nourrissant le geste philanthropique.

Nous avons alors décidé de développer une appli pour valoriser ce concept avec le but de contribuer au développement de la culture philanthropique au Québec, voire dans tout le Canada.

Quelle est l’offre de services et comment ça marche?

Toastzr fournit des services de référencement et d’échange. Ces services favorisent l’émission et l’achat de « bons de repas » permettant de partager un repas pour une bonne cause. Voici comment cela fonctionne : 

  • vous achetez un bon de repas d’un établissement participant;
  • vous mangez pour soutenir une cause qui vous tient à cœur;
  • votre engagement social est valorisé.

Soulignons que 75 % des fonds levés à travers Toastzr vont à la cause. Ainsi, Toastzr sera plus généreuse que la moyenne des fondations au Québec, à 74 % (Les affaires, 30 novembre 2013).


Pour favoriser l’engagement social de tous, Toastzr interviendra dans sept (7) domaines philanthropiques de priorité


  1. la santé et les services sociaux ;
  2. l’éducation ;
  3. l’aide internationale ;
  4. les causes humanitaires d’urgence ;
  5. les arts et la culture ;
  6. l’environnement ;
  7. l’intervention communautaire.

Qu’est-ce qui distingue l’application?

Avec Toastzr, soutenir une bonne cause devient une expérience avec un bon de repas. Car les valeurs de Toastzr sont diversité, collaboration, plaisir et partage pour assurer des revenus complémentaires à divers organismes.

En fait, nous visons un idéal social. Notre mission est tout simplement de promouvoir un monde interculturel et solidaire autour du partage de repas pour une bonne cause.

Quelle est l’entreprise derrière ce projet?

Toastzr Inter Coop est la coopérative de solidarité de droit canadien qui a développé l’appli toastzr.com. Toastzr est ainsi une entreprise sociale avec des valeurs et principes qui définissent l’économie sociale : 

  • prise en charge collective ;
  • processus démocratique ;
  • primauté de la personne sur le capital ;
  • production de biens ou services socialement utiles.

Quel est le cadre de gestion des risques relatifs à ce projet?

Projet géré dans le cadre d’une entreprise coopérative. Or dans le contexte du Québec, selon le Conseil québécois de la coopération et de la mutualité, les entreprises coopératives présentent un taux de survie nettement plus élevé que les entreprises traditionnelles, et ce, après cinq ans (62 % contre 35 %) ou dix ans (44 % contre 20 %).

Projet validé par une étude de marché concluante. Deux importants organismes ont participé au financement de cette étude, soient le Réseau d’investissement social du Québec (RISQ) et le Centre local de développement (CLD) de Shawinigan. L’étude a été réalisée par le cabinet Zins Beauchesne et associés (ZBA), qui possède plus de 30 ans d’expertise-conseil en marketing, développement et innovation.

Projet exploité à partir d’un établissement stimulant. Toastzr s’est installée le 1er août 2015 au Digihub Shawinigan, important pôle du numérique au Québec. L’interaction avec d’autres entreprises du numérique et l’accès à une infrastructure technologique de pointe sont des atouts pour le succès.

Invitations

Votre contribution nous aidera à implanter efficacement ce projet d’entreprise sociale. Vous contribuerez ainsi au développement de la culture philanthropique au Québec. Nous vous offrons d’être tout simplement des agents de changement social.


Nos besoins de financement sont ainsi estimés à 200 000 $ sur un total 333 955 $ pour favoriser l’implantation efficace de Toastzr, important projet d’entreprise sociale.

ÉQUIPE TECHNIQUE

Toastzr est le fruit d’une équipe technique compétente et expérimentée, dont les membres sont une expression de la diversité : origines culturelles, formations et expériences professionnelles.


Pidjouma Traoré, B.A.Sc.

Dix-neuf (19) ans d’expériences professionnelles avec de solides compétences en entrepreneuriat social et gestion du développement. Il a mobilisé l’équipe technique pour passer de l’idée à ce projet d’entreprise sociale. Il dirige Toastzr comme directeur général depuis le 30 mars 2015.


Fernando Garcia, B.A.


Dix (10) ans d’expériences professionnelles avec de solides compétences en design et création web, et grande implication dans le milieu communautaire.


Vanessa Negreiros, B.B.A.

Dix (10) ans d’expériences professionnelles avec de solides compétences en communication graphique et marketing.


Billy Braga, B.A.Sc.

Quatre (4) ans d’expériences professionnelles dans le domaine du web, avec de solides compétences en analyse fonctionnelle et architecturale, conception et programmation.

Charles Tollah, M.Sc.

Sept (7) ans d’expériences professionnelles avec de solides compétences en gestion de projets ainsi qu’en planification stratégique et opérationnelle.




Cliquez ici pour la version française
English

For the development of a philanthropic culture in the province of Quebec, Canada.

How did the project originate?

The November 14, 2014 issue of La Presse newspaper (pg. 7) made a review of the philanthropic sector in the province of Quebec, Canada, from 2008 to 2014, and found that there was a loss of income of 500 million dollars.

Danielle Poulin, a member of the executive committee for the Association des professionnels en gestion philanthropique (APGP; the Association of professionals in philanthropic management), makes the following diagnostic in an interview given to the newspaper: 

"The [share of the] pie for corporate donations is not growing. Money is in the hands of individuals, and since the Government's share is decreasing, there is a philanthropic culture to be developed in the province of Quebec" (free translation).

The Toastzr team has come to understand that people in the province of Quebec do give, but they expect something in return. So our team came up with the concept "Raise a Toast to the Cause!" This concept is based on the premise that since eating is a cultural gesture, sharing a meal for a good cause could help bring down human barriers while encouraging a philanthropic act as well.

Therefore we have decided to develop an app to promote this concept, with the goal of contributing to the development of a philanthropic culture in the province of Quebec, and even in Canada, from coast to coast.

What is the proposal, and how does it work?

Toastzr offers to reference and exchange services. These services facilitate issuing and buying a MEAL VOUCHER which allows people to share a meal for a good cause. Here is how it works: 

  • you buy a MEAL VOUCHER from a participating establishment;
  • you eat to support a cause that is meaningful to you;
  • your social involvement grows.

We must emphasize that 75% of the funds raised through Toastzr go to the cause. Therefore, Toastzr will be more generous than average charitable foundations in the province of Quebec at 74% (Les affaires; November 30, 2013).


To encourage everyone's social commitment, Toastzr will promote seven philanthropic domains of priority:

  1. health and social services;
  2. education;
  3. international aid;
  4. emergency humanitarian causes;
  5. arts and culture;
  6. environment;
  7. community intervention.

What is distinctive about this app?

With Toastzr, a MEAL VOUCHER becomes the means to experience supporting a good cause, because Toastzr's values are diversity, collaboration, pleasure and sharing, in order to ensure complementary income to various organizations.

In fact, we aim for a social ideal. Our mission is simply to promote a united, intercultural world through sharing a meal for a good cause.

What is the business behind this project?

Toastzr Inter Coop is the solidarity cooperative, in accordance with Canadian laws, which has developed the toastzr.com app. Toastzr is thus a social business with values and principles that define a social economy: 

  • collective endeavour;
  • democratic process;
  • the priority of people over capital;
  • production of socially useful goods and services.

What is the risk management frame for this project?

The project is managed as a cooperative enterprise. And in Quebec, according to the Conseil québécois de la coopération et de la mutualité (Quebec counsel for cooperation and mutuality), cooperative enterprises have a survival rate higher than traditional businesses, even after 5 years (62% against 35%) or 10 years (44% against 20%).

The project has been validated by a conclusive market study. Two important organizations helped to finance the study: the Réseau d'investissement social du Québec (RISQ; Quebec social investment network), and the Centre local de développement de Shawinigan (CLD; Shawinigan local development centre). The study was done by Zins Beauchesne and Associates (ZBA), which has more than 30 years of consulting experience in marketing, development and innovation.

The project is run within a stimulating environment. On August 1st, 2015, Toastzr established its office at Digihub Shawinigan, which is a major centre for digital technology in the province of Quebec. Interaction with other digital businesses and access to the latest technological infrastructure are assets for success.

Invitations

Your contribution will help us to establish this social business project in an efficient way. You will thus contribute to the development of a philanthropic culture in the province of Quebec. Wouldn't you want to become an agent of social change?

Therefore, our funding needs are estimated at $200,000 out of a total of $333,955 in order to promote the efficient implementation of Toastzr an important social business project.


OUR TEAM

Toastzr is the result of the work of a competent and experienced technical team, whose members represent a great diversity in terms of cultural background, training and professional experience.


Pidjouma Traoré, B.A.Sc.

Nineteen years of professional experience with strong competencies in social entrepreneurship and development management. He mobilized the technical team to make this idea into a social business project. He leads Toastzr as General Director since March 30, 2015.


Fernando Garcia, B.A.


Ten years of professional experience with strong competencies in web design, and a great involvement within the community.


Vanessa Negreiros, B.B.A.

Ten years of professional experience with strong competencies in graphic communication and marketing.


Billy Braga, B.A.Sc.

Four years of professional experience in web-related activities, with strong competencies in functional and architectural analysis, design and programming.

Charles Tollah, M.Sc.

Seven years of professional experience with strong competencies in project management, as well as strategic and operational planning.


The Perks

The November 14, 2014 issue of La Presse newspaper (pg. 7) made a review of the philanthropic sector in the province of Quebec, Canada, from 2008 to 2014, and found that there was a loss of income of 500 million dollars.
Danielle Poulin, a member of the executive committee for the Association des professionnels en gestion philanthropique (APGP; the Association of professionals in philanthropic management), makes the following diagnostic in an interview given to the newspaper: 
"The [share of the] pie for corporate donations is not growing. Money is in the hands of individuals, and since the Government's share is decreasing, there is a philanthropic culture to be developed in the province of Quebec" (free translation).
The Toastzr team has come to understand that people in the province of Quebec do give, but they expect something in return. So our team came up with the concept "Raise a Toast to the Cause!" This concept is based on the premise that since eating is a cultural gesture, sharing a meal for a good cause could help bring down human barriers while encouraging a philanthropic act as well.
Therefore we have decided to develop an app to promote this concept, with the goal of contributing to the development of a philanthropic culture in the province of Quebec, and even in Canada, from coast to coast.


What is the proposal, and how does it work?
Toastzr offers to reference and exchange services. These services facilitate issuing and buying a MEAL VOUCHER which allows people to share a meal for a good cause. Here is how it works: 


you buy a MEAL VOUCHER from a participating establishment;


you eat to support a cause that is meaningful to you;


your social involvement grows.



We must emphasize that 75% of the funds raised through Toastzr go to the cause. Therefore, Toastzr will be more generous than average charitable foundations in the province of Quebec at 74% (Les affaires; November 30, 2013).

To encourage everyone's social commitment, Toastzr will promote seven philanthropic domains of priority:



health and social services;


education;


international aid;


emergency humanitarian causes;


arts and culture;


environment;


community intervention.




What is distinctive about this app?

With Toastzr, a MEAL VOUCHER becomes the means to experience supporting a good cause, because Toastzr's values are diversity, collaboration, pleasure and sharing, in order to ensure complementary income to various organizations.In fact, we aim for a social ideal. Our mission is simply to promote a united, intercultural world through sharing a meal for a good cause.

What is the business behind this project?
Toastzr Inter Coop is the solidarity cooperative, in accordance with Canadian laws, which has developed the toastzr.com app. Toastzr is thus a social business with values and principles that define a social economy: 


collective endeavour;


democratic process;


the priority of people over capital;


production of socially useful goods and services.




What is the risk management frame for this project?
The project is managed as a cooperative enterprise. And in Quebec, according to the Conseil québécois de la coopération et de la mutualité (Quebec counsel for cooperation and mutuality), cooperative enterprises have a survival rate higher than traditional businesses, even after 5 years (62% against 35%) or 10 years (44% against 20%).
The project has been validated by a conclusive market study. Two important organizations helped to finance the study: the Réseau d'investissement social du Québec (RISQ; Quebec social investment network), and the Centre local de développement de Shawinigan (CLD; Shawinigan local development centre). The study was done by Zins Beauchesne and Associates (ZBA), which has more than 30 years of consulting experience in marketing, development and innovation.
The project is run within a stimulating environment. On August 1st, 2015, Toastzr established its office at Digihub Shawinigan, which is a major centre for digital technology in the province of Quebec. Interaction with other digital businesses and access to the latest technological infrastructure are assets for success.


Invitations
Your contribution will help us to establish this social business project in an efficient way. You will thus contribute to the development of a philanthropic culture in the province of Quebec. Wouldn't you want to become an agent of social change?

Therefore, our funding needs are estimated at $200,000 out of a total of $333,955 in order to promote the efficient implementation of Toastzr an important social business project. 



OUR TEAM
Toastzr is the result of the work of a competent and experienced technical team, whose members represent a great diversity in terms of cultural background, training and professional experience.

Pidjouma Traoré, B.A.Sc.

Nineteen years of professional experience with strong competencies in social entrepreneurship and development management. He mobilized the technical team to make this idea into a social business project. He leads Toastzr as General Director since March 30, 2015.

Fernando Garcia, B.A.


Ten years of professional experience with strong competencies in web design, and a great involvement within the community.

Vanessa Negreiros, B.B.A.

Ten years of professional experience with strong competencies in graphic communication and marketing.

Billy Braga, B.A.Sc.

Four years of professional experience in web-related activities, with strong competencies in functional and architectural analysis, design and programming.
Charles Tollah, M.Sc.

Seven years of professional experience with strong competencies in project management, as well as strategic and operational planning.


The Perks

story:
La Coalition BDS-Québec (Boycott, Désinvestissement, Sanctions) s’invite dans la campagne électorale fédérale

www.bdsquebec.ca

Nous avons besoin de votre aide financière pour continuer à afficher nos pancartes! En donnant 20$, vous assurez qu’une nouvelle affiche soit posée!

Au-delà du ronron des discours d’usage, de la diplomatie traditionnelle des multiples et inefficaces «processus de paix», de l’apathie complaisante,  de la cécité volontaire et de l’ineptie meurtrière de la communauté internationale, comment les partis s’engageront-ils à mettre fin à l’impunité du régime d’apartheid israélien ?

Le gouvernement porté au pouvoir le 19 octobre s’engagera-t-il à :

Orienter la politique canadienne :

  • vers un règlement pacifique et juste du conflit israélo-palestinien basé sur le respect du droit international et des droits fondamentaux du peuple palestinien dont son droit inaliénable à l’autodétermination;
  • vers une participation active à l’ONU de manière à faire cesser toute complaisance de la communauté internationale envers Israël;
  • vers une contribution financière accrue à l’Agence de l’ONU pour les réfugiés palestiniens;
  • vers une dénonciation sans ambiguïté des politiques d’agressions militaires meurtrières d’Israël et une réponse positive à l’appel des Palestinien-ne-s pour un embargo militaire. 

Appuyer tous les moyens d’action pacifiques pour faire respecter les droits des Palestinien-ne-s dont la campagne pacifique de boycott, désinvestissement et sanctions contre Israël comme le Canada l’a fait contre l’Afrique du Sud lors de la lutte anti-apartheid.

Annuler le Protocole d’entente avec Israël concernant la diplomatie publique signé par le Canada en janvier 2015 déclarant toute critique d’Israël comme étant un « ciblage sélectif constitutif du nouveau visage de l’antisémitisme et déclarant que le Canada s’opposera à ceux et celles qui soutiennent le mouvement BDS »

Depuis des décennies, les politiques d’occupation, de colonisation et d’apartheid des gouvernements israéliens successifs constituent :

  • de puissants moyens de soumettre, d’exploiter et de faire disparaître le peuple palestinien en tant que peuple au point où on peut parler de « sociocide » ou carrément de « génocide ». Israël serait le seul détenteur d’un « droit à l’existence » mais non pas le peuple palestinien… cherchez l’erreur !!!
  • des violations permanentes du droit international et des droits fondamentaux des Palestiniennes et Palestiniens dont leur droit à l’autodétermination;
  • des facteurs majeurs d’instabilité au Moyen Orient et dans le monde.

Tout cela avec la complicité soutenue de la communauté internationale dont le Canada en particulier.

QUE FERA LE GOUVERNEMENT PORTÉ AU POUVOIR, LE 19 OCTOBRE, POUR BÂTIR UNE POLITIQUE CANADIENNE JUSTE ENVERS LE PEUPLE PALESTINIEN

Les politiques canadiennes – peu importe le parti au pouvoir- ont toujours manifesté un « préjugé » plus que favorable à Israël au détriment du peuple palestinien. Le gouvernement Harper a poussé cette asymétrie à des sommets jamais encore égalés. Devenu le « plus meilleur ami » d’Israël, le Canada s’est transformé en « groupie » du gouvernement d’extrême-droite de Netanyahou, en défenseur aveugle de ses politiques militaires agressives, en facteur de nuisance à l’ONU bloquant toute tentative des Palestinien-ne-s d’y occuper une place significative … une honte pour les Canadiennes et Canadiens !

Il est grand temps que le gouvernement canadien s’engage à :

  • mettre en application le droit de retour des réfugié-e-s palestinien-ne-s (résolution 194 de l’Assemblée générale de l’ONU du 11 décembre 1948);
  • mettre fin immédiatement à l’occupation d’un territoire qui ne lui appartient pas (résolution 242 du Conseil de sécurité de l’ONU) ;
  • mettre fin à la colonisation permanente illégale et source constante de violence de la part des colons juifs envers les Palestinien-ne-s (article 49 de la IVe Convention de Genève);
  • déconstruire le MUR de séparation/annexion/apartheid tel que demandé par la Cour internationale de Justice en juillet 2004 ;
  • mettre fin à ses politiques d’apartheid dans le respect de la Convention internationale sur l’élimination et la suppression du crime d’apartheid (1973);
  • mettre fin au blocus illégal et immoral de Gaza et cesser ses agressions militaires répétées et  meurtrières contre les Palestinien-ne-s de Gaza;
  • libérer tous les prisonniers politiques de même que celles et ceux (dont des enfants) retenus en détention administrative illégale.

story:
What is CliniqFinder? 


CliniqFinder is a beautifully designed website for booking appointments with the doctors you love near you. Designed for accommodating hundreds of doctors and thousands of patients' accounts, it's a website designed to provide all necessary information for booking the right private doctor, who will have his own web page complete with photos, CVs, reviews, treatments, prices, location on a map and special deals.
We have been designing and custom building websites that have millions of visits for over five years. We custom built our first cloud storage reviews website in 2013, and during this process we discovered that reviews are very powerful in making people decide what to buy or use; reviews drive a lot of traffic to businesses, they are trusted because made by real customers and according to Amazon's report they are good also when they are negative as well. With CliniqFinder we wanted to give doctors the possibility to improve their reputation with transparency, reviews, pricing, treatments all available online on Cliniqfinder with a beautiful website that is easy to use and allows instant bookings of appointments.
We have always booked online holidays, cars, travels, flights, why can't we also book doctors appointments? 
Cliniqfinder team and story
The project author's name is Luca Tagliaferro, he is an experienced web marketing professional. The second team member is a web developer, Davide, working at the moment as a Senior Team Manager for a technology company. We are both italians living in the UK. The idea of Cliniqfinder started actually 1 year ago when I was looking for a dentist for me toothache in the south of England. This experience was really frustrating for me because I couldn't find and compare prices, treatments, location so I ended up going googling. But also on Google I couldn't find any information so I got so frustrated to the point where I said to myself: "let's build a website that allows people find a book a doctor online in a few minutes".

The reason this campaign is important to me is twofold. First of all, I grew up in a family of doctors and when I was a kid and my dad was working as a GP in the 80s and 90s, I used to answer the phone at all times during the day and the night when my dad wasn't there to pick it up. Patients wanted to book an appointment with him. 

Second, I believe the Internet is a huge opportunity to migrate all clinics' appointments from the phone to the web, thus making the administration and the marketing of doctors a much easier and straightforward thing to do. This implies a strong technology service and this is how Cliniqfinder comes to help. It allows two things: 

1. Reducing the amount of work and time doctors spend on looking for new patients;

2. Helping patients to find and book the best available deal for the treatment they request.

Not much has changed today since the 90s when I used to pick up the phone for my dad and he used to make appointments and sign them on a paper. Still now many clinics and practices in the private sector do this, they rely on pen and paper. The paradox is that we can book holidays and hotels online, why can't we also book doctors? 

Where we are in development:

  1. Design – We have already completed our design and the first layouts for all website pages with Photoshop
  2. Relationships with doctors –We have established a great working relationship with some local doctors ready to test the app and start receiving online appointments to their clinic.
  3. Business plan - The marketing, business and sales plan has already been written in over 100 document pages;
  4. Development of the website - As of December 2014,development started and you can see it here: http://www.cliniqfinder.com


What We Need 

  • We need £15,000 to start building the website front-end and back-end according to the highest technical standards to allocate accounts for hundreds of doctors and thousands of patients every day. 
  • We have costs for hosting the website;
  • Testing the website, new patients will have some issues probably and when we find out what issues they have we will have to spend money to fix them. 

What you get as a patient

This is how the results page will look like for patients, showing a map, available appointments and more information about doctors:


This what the main home page for doctors will look like:


For Patients - 100% free use of Cliniqfinder

From the patient point of view, this is what you can do with Cliniqfinder for free:

1. Search for doctors. Search for the type of treatment on the search bar and then add the location near you. We provide dozens of different treatments and doctors in your area, it will be easy for you to find a doctor you love. This is an easy to use tool that will save you so much time and frustrations, all those problems that you have when searching online for a doctor.

2.Book real time appointments. Possibly the most important service of Cliniqfinder, because it will allow you to find an available appointment for the doctor you love. And consider time slots and location when deciding which doctor you need and answer your question: “Is my need an emergency or can I wait a couple of days?”.If your tooth aches badly you can find a doctor to book the same day. But maybe you want to simply avoid the unlimited waiting on the phone with the clinic’s assistant, or maybe you want to book an appointment when the time suits you, weekends or evenings, when the clinic is closed and you can’t call them. Simply another way to book online: Cliniqfinder allows 24/7 bookings.

3.Get appointments confirmation. Booking an appointment is not the end of this service. Cliniqfinder will send you an email with the confirmation of your booking to make theprocess much more efficient and smooth. And you also get confirmation by SMS one day before you appointment is due to make sure you won’t forget it. You won’t have to remember anything, because Cliniqfinder will do it for you. You can simply keep focused on your daily activities and when the time comes, we will remind you of your appointment to your doctor.

4. Read or upload your review.Research shows that online reviews strongly influence the decision to choose a service since 73% of customers rely on reviews before making any type of decision online. This is the second most important service we offer, because it allows you to read other’s customers reviews that are verified by us. If you want to share with the world how fantastic your visit was, then all you have to do is reply to our email that will ask you to leave a review of your last visit.

5. Learn about wellness and science issues. Cliniqfinder will have an up-to-date and informative blog where you can read on all topics related to your health, to the science, biology and wellness in general. Our articles have the main aim to share all this knowledge and are written by healthcare professionals and scientific researches. They will answer these type of questions: “How much information can our brain store?”. Or maybe you want to read about “Can peanut allergies be prevented?” or else “What does the dentist check on your first assessment?”. You can find answers to all these questions in our blog, we hope you will find it informative and interesting.


 

The Impact


Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
Healthcare bookings will soon be commercialised as much as holidays, hotels, flights and cars that can all be booked online today. The healthcare system is traditionalist, meaning that doctors prefer to speak to their patients on the phone rather than receiving appointments online from a software so the real question is not how doctor communicate with the patients, but rather how patients will find and chose a doctor? In a world where people spend 8 of their 24 hours a day on the web searching for all type of information on Google and Bing, can doctors really afford not to have an online presence that allows them to be found and booked? It's simply a big burden for doctors to manage their marketing, to have the skills to do SEO, Adwords, Email Marketing, Online Booking, Content Marketing, yet these marketing disciplines are so important for every type of company, why can't be also important for a healthcare clinic?  
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
I have been working in all sort of marketing projects, but CliniqFinder is the first of this kind for me. 
  • Make it real for people and build trust.
It's really a big project this one that can be accomplished with the efforts of all people from Indiegogo. Me and my partner we are here to build a software, we need the money to pay someone to help us building it, it's an application that does something good to people, we are here to use technology and its benefits to create a unique product that can change the lives of us all. 
Example of how clinics/ doctors will add their data in their account: here is the process in 5 easy steps to make the account ready within 2 minutes.


Risks & Challenges

We are fortunate to have spent so much time on business planning, doctors relationships and website design prior to launching our Indiegogo campaign. We can’t mitigate all of the risks, but by waiting until this stage of development, we believe that we have minimized most of them. Of course, with any project like this, there are potential risks in final product development, clinics' agreements, development and promotion, and fulfillment.

Final product development: It is possible that there will need to be subtle changes to the software by development requirements. We will continue to iterate on development and pre-production to minimize the impact of these changes. Of course, we believe that any changes will be in an effort to improve the final product, and we will keep our backers posted about any such changes. Considering the development work that has already been completed and the business plan already in place, we expect these to be minimal. 
Doctors' approach to patients: Doctors are traditionalists, like I said before, from our market research already completed, we found out they prefer to speak directly to their patients rather than receiving bookings from a software, they prefer personal interaction. This risk is due to lack of information and communication, doctors don't understand what Cliniqfinder can do for them, we are developing this project not only to help them manage their bookings, but also to help them get found online. So to overcome this risk of doctors not understanding our product, we need to communicate better with doctors, promote Cliniqfinder as their partner in marketing and online booking.
Competitors: Bigger companies are already developing similar projects. Millions of pounds are invested in these types of online appointments, we cannot compete with them on this level. What we can do is make our product smarter than theirs, we can study their products and improve them before we go live, this is something we have already done but I won't go into much details here, I don't have the space. 
Fulfillment: if demand is greater than expected, this could impact the server's capacity to maintain such a high number of patients and doctors' accounts. We will strive to ensure that our fulfillment process and resources (both internal and external) are scaled up appropriately, based on response from the campaign.


FAQs
