story:
Kickstarter Project Link: goo.gl/zaoVZW

Get yours soon...ends July 28th

 

 

 

"Cautious Fred" featured on

The Huffington Post! 

 

Read the article here!

_____________________________________________________________________________

 

Who Am I? 

I'm Amy Winfield. As a mother of two, I love to feed children’s minds with powerful images that uncover the beauty in the world and warn them to be cautious of the bad. I am a children’s book author that pens exciting tales for toddlers, kids and preteens.

My most rewarding moment was when I discovered that stories have the ability to inspire. I was fortunate to learn my passion for telling stories at a very young age.

 

About This Project

Cautious Fred is a rhyming story of a little green frog walking home from school through a thick, eerie bog. Along the way, he meets several shifty characters – a crafty croc, a sneaky snake, a beautiful but sharp-clawed lizard, and other suspicious creatures. With his mother’s advice ringing in his ears, Freddy must remember to keep safe on his own. 

The story is designed to teach elementary-aged children how to be cautious when they are by themselves – whether walking to and from school, going to the park or their friend’s houses, or even when they join us for errands. We can’t keep our eyes on our children 100% of the time, and as they get older, we want them to become more independent – and that includes knowing how to be aware of their surroundings and the people around them.

This isn’t a “Stranger Danger” book. Numerous studies and countless experts have repeatedly said that “Stranger Danger” is a message that often confuses children: should they talk to police officers, who are also strangers? Do they say hi to an adult who says hi to them?

We don’t want to discourage children’s friendliness, nor teach them to be afraid of people who can help them. That’s why Cautious Fred shows kids not only how to be aware of suspicious people, but more importantly, suspicious situations, which are a bit harder to detect and can occur with both strangers and people they know. 

Freddy runs into several different situations, all with very different characters – some are beautiful, some are friendly; some look like they are hurt and need help. Throughout the story, Freddy follows his intuition and acts wisely, teaching kids to do the same.

As a mom of two, I care about my children’s safety, a feeling I’m sure all parents share. So, I wrote this book out of a passion to assist parents and all caregivers in their efforts to teach children how to be safe on their own. What also fueled me to write Cautious Fred was my husband’s experience as a child. While walking home from school with his older sister, a woman in a station wagon pulled up and asked them if they wanted some candy.

He headed towards the car, but his sister pulled him away and shouted, “Let’s get out of here!” and the woman quickly drove off. While it’s great nothing worse happened to them, the thing that always stuck out in my mind was: what if his sister wasn’t there that day? I’ve heard similar stories from others, who have had close calls themselves. Cautious Fred empowers children with the knowledge of what to do in such situations.

This book is a labor of love with lots of patience mixed in. After completing the manuscript, my husband and two children joined in helping me with the layout and sketches. Most nights we sat at the table determining the characters’ look, placement, and roughly sketching the scene for each page. Then we sent our rough sketches to our South African illustrator, Katlego Kgabale, also known as Kady. Kady turned those rough sketches into our vision and brought each page to life with beautiful living colors.

 

What You Get

 The Printed Book

How will the funds be used? 

My purpose for this Indiegogo project is for the printing of the book so everyone (including me!) can have a hardcover copy of Cautious Fred. The book illustrations are complete; I paid for this prior to launching the project. The biggest cost now comes from the proofing, printing and shipment of the books – this small print run will cost approximately $6000. Beyond the printing cost, there are a few additional fees, taxes, and other project expenses that bring me to the goal of $8000.

The Impact

Rather than teaching children to be afraid of all strangers, including police officers, teachers, and other adults that could help them, “Cautious Fred” teaches kids awareness. Caregivers will have a memorable story as an aid that allows them to teach kids about situational awareness so that they can keep themselves safe. This tool will remind them to be aware of suspicious characters and situations whether at the park, at a friend’s house, or walking home from school. 

Risks & Challenges

I’ve met four of my biggest challenges: I’ve completed the writing, editing, illustrations and formatting. Now, I’m focused on printing and distributing a 42-page, first edition hardcover book, complete with a dust-cover jacket. I’ve selected a great, professional printing company who will make this book into a beautiful reality. And to further minimize risks, I’m working with a fulfillment company to keep shipping problems at a minimum and to control costs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please comment, comment, comment on this Indiegogo page! This helps "Cautious Fred" be seen by more people on Indiegogo and other sites as well. Any shares on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc., is also hugely effective to get the word out about this project. And, of course, word of mouth is just as helpful. 

Coming Soon - Cool Stretch Goals 

In order to put Cautious Fred into the hands of children, I need your help to reach my goal, which will cover the printing and shipping costs. Once I reach my goal, I will announce some cool stretch goals!

So, I wrote this book out of a passion to assist parents and all caregivers in their efforts to teach children how to be safe on their own. What also fueled me to write Cautious Fred was my husband’s experience as a child. While walking home from school with his older sister, a woman in a station wagon pulled up and asked them if they wanted some candy.

He headed towards the car, but his sister pulled him away and shouted, “Let’s get out of here!” and the woman quickly drove off. While it’s great nothing worse happened to them, the thing that always stuck out in my mind was: what if his sister wasn’t there that day? I’ve heard similar stories from others, who have had close calls themselves. Cautious Fred empowers children with the knowledge of what to do in such situations.


This book is a labor of love with lots of patience mixed in. After completing the manuscript, my husband and two children joined in helping me with the layout and sketches. Most nights we sat at the table determining the characters’ look, placement, and roughly sketching the scene for each page. Then we sent our rough sketches to our South African illustrator, Katlego Kgabale, also known as Kady. Kady turned those rough sketches into our vision and brought each page to life with beautiful living colors.
 
What You Get









 The Printed Book

How will the funds be used? 
My purpose for this Indiegogo project is for the printing of the book so everyone (including me!) can have a hardcover copy of Cautious Fred. The book illustrations are complete; I paid for this prior to launching the project. The biggest cost now comes from the proofing, printing and shipment of the books – this small print run will cost approximately $6000. Beyond the printing cost, there are a few additional fees, taxes, and other project expenses that bring me to the goal of $8000.

The Impact
Rather than teaching children to be afraid of all strangers, including police officers, teachers, and other adults that could help them, “Cautious Fred” teaches kids awareness. Caregivers will have a memorable story as an aid that allows them to teach kids about situational awareness so that they can keep themselves safe. This tool will remind them to be aware of suspicious characters and situations whether at the park, at a friend’s house, or walking home from school. 

Risks & Challenges
I’ve met four of my biggest challenges: I’ve completed the writing, editing, illustrations and formatting. Now, I’m focused on printing and distributing a 42-page, first edition hardcover book, complete with a dust-cover jacket. I’ve selected a great, professional printing company who will make this book into a beautiful reality. And to further minimize risks, I’m working with a fulfillment company to keep shipping problems at a minimum and to control costs.

Other Ways You Can Help
Please comment, comment, comment on this Indiegogo page! This helps "Cautious Fred" be seen by more people on Indiegogo and other sites as well. Any shares on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc., is also hugely effective to get the word out about this project. And, of course, word of mouth is just as helpful. 
Coming Soon - Cool Stretch Goals 
In order to put Cautious Fred into the hands of children, I need your help to reach my goal, which will cover the printing and shipping costs. Once I reach my goal, I will announce some cool stretch goals!

story:
The Lowdown

Speaking out and speaking up has gotten me into and out of a lot of trouble in my life. The way it works is, I start somewhere and take you all around the world without leaving the neighbourhood. I'll talk you through string theory and social constructs via high school bus rides and TV episodes and.... I'm going to do improvised spoken word for 45 minutes a day, six days a week, for a month. 

Yeah, it sounds crazy. But us - me, plus you - we. We can do it together. 

 

What's the show about? 

The show is Be Spoken:

To Be Spoken is to speak out your own and other's truths until the world is small and finite like a distant star. Until the space between you two is filled with love and life. 

In my show I will tell the tallest tales, break hearts with other's love stories. We'll laugh with crying or cry with laughing - that's all. 

 

Bits and Pieces or Nuts and Bolts (Basically what we need to run the show0

It's crazy to perform at Edinburgh Fringe - no one does it to make a profit. Have you seen how much it costs to rent a flat during the festival? I'm going to stick to using the bus, stay in the smallest room of the kindest old lady who might offer me a sandwich - that's my budget. 

 

When we include travel expenses, and one or two flyers so that people come to hear me talk - I'm going to need about £2,500. 

But if you help, I can give you something back! 

£50 - Personalised recorded poem, with signed transcription.  

£30 - Recorded improv poem (MP3), personalised for you. 

£20 - Signed print of an improv poem, created and personalised for you. 

£10 - 2 Unreleased poems straight from the brain-bin. 

What else can I do?

You can also contribute to me being 'us' on the Scottish stage by: 

Sharing this page on your social media!

Doing something nice for the people who love you 

Signing up to my newsletter for updates on my projects: https://tinyletter.com/jmepoetry/ 

Saying something true everyday for the month I'm up there - I could use the material

Liking my artist's page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/toussaintearly/ 

Thank you!

story:
My name is Hilary Moore. I am writing to ask your help in helping me complete my book, No Fascist USA: The John Brown Anti-Klan Committee (JBAKC) in the Reagan Years. It will be published by City Lights/Open Media in 2019. In this book, my co-author James Tracy and I will tell the story of an important anti-fascist organization from the 1980s. The JBAKC mobilized white people to expose and confront neo-Nazi organizing, support political prisoners, and build alliances with radicals of color. They faced many of the same challenges that anti-racist organizations deal with today.

 

Your solidarity will help me focus on writing, researching, and editing our book. I am currently working-extremely part time. Today’s resurgence of the organized racist right motivates me to do this work. My experiences growing up white and working-poor in the California Sierra Nevada foothills lit a fire in me to build strong and compelling anti racist movements that can win. And as Trump ends the DACA program and Steve Bannon tours Europe speaking to coalitions of white nationalists, we are in desperate need of stories from people who traversed these waters before us.

 

Will you help me raise $5,000? Our deadline is November 30th of this year and, with your help, $5,000 will cover the expenses of researching this under-documented history.

 

I joined the Catalyst Project collective in 2014 as co-coordinator, supporting grassroots groups across the country to strengthen their anti-racist campaigns. Since working with Catalyst, I have traveled all over the US and Europe supporting organizations fighting against white supremacy. I have worked with people that take up really different approaches. The one thing I have heard consistently, despite where people live, what language they speak, or their political background, is the need to know who has done this work before.

 

They want to know what worked and what did not. They want to hear what people learned. They want to know what was happening at that moment in history that made some choices strategic and some counter productive. Basically, they want to know that they aren't alone. 

 

I've done projects like this before.  In 2009, I co-founded the Mobilization for Climate Justice West and wrote about the lessons from that organizing in Organizing Cools the Planet: Tools and Reflections to Navigate the Climate Crisis (PM Press). I am passionate about action and reflection together and I believe writing out stories and lessons helps to incite ideas, experiments, and increase the impact of radical change.

 

Please support this book by donating $10, $20, $50, $100, or $200 now. With your help, we can write the lessons waiting in our anti fascist movement history.

 

Please share this with two friends you know who would be interested in reading No Fascist USA! when it comes out.

 

Thank you!!

Hilary

story:
Short Summary

My daughter Santy Hernandez is a 15 year old, growing up in California. Our family comes from Guatemala, Chivarreto. She loves to film take pictures, but she's always been the type of person who enjoys  books and writing. One day in her third grade class, she wrote the story of Don't Show Off. Don't Show Off changed her live because many opportunities opened for her. She was inspired to do more and she wants to inspire others.  "Back in my country, kids are working at the age of 5. Girls are getting married at 13. The children lose hope on what to do in their lives. I want them to see that no matter where we come from we can achieve great things."-Santy

We are all working as a team to make this happen.

What We Need & What You Get

We need money to pay for the publishing.

The Impact

We believe that his book can inspire the youth in the world. The story is very powerful we hope that everyone gets something out of this book. 

Risks & Challenges

Our goal to publish Don't show off by February 2017, but It may take longer. It doesn't matter how long it takes as long as it comes out. THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR ALL YOUR SUPPORT.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
SUMMARY

The September Issues gives women creatives the opportunity to express themselves freely, explore their identities, and build a community without any constraints—a place where art, beauty, fashion, and topical issues can be discussed from a purely feminine perspective; a community that reflects the diversity and power of global femininity.

We are unique in that this is a biannual magazine made by women.  Each issue will donate a portion of its proceeds to an organization which supports women.  For this issue, we have chosen Planned Parenthood. Our goal is to make fashion, an industry intrinsically linked with the rights of women, a feminist issue. 

We celebrate all types of women, which is why the theme of our first issue is “The Power of the Femme.” All of our contributors for this issue have been asked to interpret this concept as they wish, because female empowerment isn’t just a marketing gimmick on a t-shirt—it’s a point that has become impossible to ignore. 

The magazine aims to share ideas of identity, discover ritual and ceremony; celebrate and champion women pioneers of the past and present, and those yet to come—exchanging the story of women’s lives through visual and intellectual vocabularies. 

Politically, the world is fragmented. Recent events have demonstrated that change is most definitely the only thing we can be sure of in this moment. We, The September Issues want to be an active part of that change. We want to empower women by celebrating their achievements, and strive for the creation of an influential voice of equality in our future society. 

THE CONTRIBUTORS

THE GOAL

This is a completely self funded magazine. Myself and our contributors have put in a lot of time and personal savings to help make this vision a reality.  I am so grateful to everyone who has made this first issue possible.  With your support, you will also be a part of a new way to communicate with women and change the face of what a fashion magazine can be.  

Help us in reaching our goal of  75,000 USD. I know it sounds like a lot,  but this production is sizeable. The funds raised will go to cover mainly printing costs as well as numerous production costs, design of the magazine, social media promotion, website design + launch, distribution costs and legal fees. It will also be used to promote and propel this magazine concept further into publishing issue 2 and hopefully many more to come!

 

Preview of the layout and what you can expect to see in the magazine:

story:
Restituamus Imperium!


What is This?

Founded 2,700 years ago, Rome grew to become one of the most influential civilizations of all time. They left a legal, linguistic, and philosophical legacy that remains with us today. The ruins of roman cities inspire the imagination of all who see them. Most civilizations today owe their very existence to ancient Rome. The loss of ancient Roman society is a tragedy and that is why we are working to rebuild it in modern times.

Today, Europe and the world are in economic and political turmoil. A rebuilt Rome can bring stabilization to the region. It will be able to bring jobs and progress. But we need your help to make this dream a reality.

Join us as we rebuild this once great civilization and restore it to its former glory.

Plan of Action

Rebuilding ancient Rome is not some impossible dream. With the proper planning and participation it can be accomplished and in a short time. You are probably questioning how Rome can be rebuilt. Let's give you the answer:

Phase 1 – A Voice For Change

The first phase of this project will involve laying the foundation for the movement that will rebuild Rome. We have no false notions that this movement will become popular overnight. It will start small and take great effort to grow.

The first part of this project will involve establishing both online and real world groups of supporters. We will hold online and real world meetings where we will seek solutions for local problems, strengthen each other, and advocate change.

We will also be establishing the foundation for the Roman Economy. This will include the minting of Roman coinage which will be made of valuable metals. These will serve to back paper and digital currency. There will also be an online currency system established so that members can buy and sell using Roman money.

Additionally we will support humanitarian projects and charities under the name of Rome. Our primary goal is to positively change lives and we want to start this from the very beginning.

Phase 2 – Realizing Change

The second phase of this project will be devoted to realizing change in local laws and encouraging Roman citizenship.

We will be actively advocating citizenship in Rome and will be using advertisements and local activism to do so. Gatherings of members will continue and citizens will engage in peaceful rallies and protests.

Citizens will be active in the political process. This means that they will not only be advocating change to local leaders, but also running for political office where able. The change that will be advocated is a simplification of legal processes (decreasing bureaucracy) and a return to Roman law*.

There will be economic and business investments made during this time. These will be done to increase the economic power of Roman society.

Charitable projects will continue during this phase as well. They will be moved more toward Roman-centric projects under Roman run charities.

* We recognize that much social change and progress has taken place since Roman times. We advocate the return to Roman law, but also the revision of those laws to include these changes.

Phase 3 – Political Involvement

The third phase of this project will involve increasing involvement of political and business leaders in Roman society. It is during this phase that the Roman movement will be advantageous enough that nations will take Rome seriously as a viable option.

Political leaders of various countries in Roman territories will be encouraged to become involved in Rome. In addition to public support for nations to join with Rome there will be economic and political incentives. These incentives will be things like: stronger economic alliances, more stable politics, greater influence in global politics. These will bring a push for Roman society on two fronts. Both from the general populace and from political leaders.

We will also advocate participation in Roman society to business leaders. There will be incentives given for businesses to get involved in the rebuilding of Roman civilization. These incentives will include things like business contracts, access to new markets, and and economically stronger customer base.

Why Rome Should be Rebuilt?

Other than the "cool" factor there are many reasons why the Roman civilization should be rebuilt.

Stable Economy – The European economy is based on fractional reserve banking. This basically means that money is made up out of thin air. Unsurprisingly this system is failing. The Roman economy will be built on currency backed by precious metals. Because precious metals have intrinsic value, Roman currency will be much stronger than the Euro.

Simplified Government – As time goes on and legal decisions are made, the laws of a nation becomes cumbersome. Just as Justinian reformed and streamlined the legal code; we too will cut away the dead weight and excess bureaucracy. We will institute a legal code based on ancient Roman law modified to meet modern needs.

Leading Edge of Technology – A rebuilt Rome will advocate progress in technology and industry. This will create jobs and advances in communication, energy, medicine, and many other areas.

Stabilize Volatile Regions – There is a great deal of turmoil in some regions of Europe. A rebuilt Roman civilization will be able to stabilize these regions through political and economic advances.

Improve Infrastructure – A rebuilt Rome will be able to quickly institute advanced infrastructure including transportation and energy. Today advances are being made in the areas of solar, wind, wave, and other energy production systems. There will also be developments made in agriculture and self-sufficiency of communities.

Reduce Cost of Living – With a stronger economy, advanced infrastructure, and greater self-sufficiency, the cost of living will go down and quality of life will go up.

Provide Jobs – The opportunities and projects developed by a rebuilt Rome will bring more jobs. More jobs will in turn boost the economy.

What Do We Need?

To get this movement started we are gathering funds for the completion of Phase 1. These funds will be is directed at three main projects. These projects are building the economy, promoting the movement, and charity.

*These percentages are based on money after perks are fulfilled.

Build up the Roman Economy – One of the first things we will do is start building a stable Roman economy. We will be minting Roman coins as well as opening an online banking system. The coins we will mint will be based on ancient Roman denominations: Aureus (gold), Solidus (gold), Antoninianus (silver), Denarius (Silver), Quinarius Argentus (Silver), Sestertius (brass), Dupondis (brass), As (copper), Semis (bronze), Quadrans (bronze), Uncia (bronze).

Because we live in a digital age our online banking system will probably be used more than coins. However, the coins will be used as backing for the digital and paper money system. This will help stabilize the European economy because, instead of fiat currency, money will be backed by something that actually has value.

To Summarize how we will be using €52.500:

- Mint coins

- Establish online currency system


Promote the Movement - We will also be using the money to promote the movement. Information is key to any successful movement. Supporters are gained as they learn about the benefits a movement will bring. That is why we will be creating multilingual booklets, flyers, etc. These will be used to inform people about the rebuilding of the Roman government. This money will also be used to organize public gatherings.

To Summarize how we will be using €22.500:

- Print promotional material

- Advertisements

- Fund meetings and gatherings

- Website and hosting


Charity – We want to directly help people in the area of the ancient Roman government. Half of the money we raise will go directly towards charitable projects, including disaster relief, medical care for children, etc. We want to help improve the quality of life for people in Roman lands. A public accounting of this money will be made so you will know exactly where your money is going.

To Summarize how we will be using €75.000:

- Provide food for the poor.

- Assist impoverished children.

- Support community improvement.

- Etc.


Perks – Some of the money you contribute will go towards providing you with awesome perks. This covers things like purchasing, packaging, shipping, etc. Fulfilling perks is calculated to be approximately 10% of contributions. To reach our funding level we need to add another €15.000 to our total to account for that.


What You Get

Freebies:

Join our Facebook Group.

Download a free wallpaper:

2560x1560
2048x1536
1920x1080
1680x1050
1600x1200
1440x900
1280x1024
1280x800
800x600
640x1136
340x960
320x480


Perks:


Other Ways You Can Help

Do you want to help rebuild Roman society and don’t have any money to contribute? There are still ways you can help.

Share Our Campaign – Share our campaign with your friends and followers on social media.

Tell Your Friends and Family – Talk to your friends and families about our campaign.

Join Our Online Community – Like our Facebook page and join our group.


FAQ

Who is running this project?

This project is run by a group of European and American enthusiasts of ancient Rome, who want to see a revitalization of the society that founded western civilization. We have a variety of experiences and backgrounds. You can learn more about us and even chat with us on our facebook group.

Are you serious?

We are very serious. Rebuilding the roman government will be beneficial to Europe and the world. When established, the roman government will be able to bring benefits to the area including improved economy, jobs, and more streamlined government interaction.

Why rebuild the Roman government?

The ancient roman civilization laid the foundation for modern life. And the restoration of the Roman government would benefit, not only Europe, but also the world. Ancient Rome is understood to have been a forerunner in innovation and technology. We can bring these qualities back, and create innovations that will not only improve the quality of life in Europe, but also around the world.

Many people falsely believe that the Roman government fell in 476AD. The truth is history is much more complicated than that. The Roman government continued in the east for another 977 years. Also in 800AD the Pope gave the title of Roman Emperor to Charlemagne. On that date the roman government was effectively reestablished in the west.

This Roman government ended only relatively recently, in 1806, when Francis II abdicated the title of Imperator Romanorum. This means that over the past 2768 years only 209 of those have been without a Roman government.

Religiously speaking, Rome has continued to the present day through the Roman Catholic Church and the Pope, as well as through the Eastern Orthodox Church.

Anciently people of all varieties of ethnicity were Roman. Thus as an ethnicity, Roman, continues on to this very day through the many inhabitants of Europe.

In some ways Rome is alive and well in religious and ethnographic spheres. It is our desire to bring it back in the political realm.

Are you trying to restore a specific era in Roman History?

Yes and no. We look to the classic roman era as a guide. However, at the same time it would be foolish to ignore developments in recent history. Rome’s history spans the time of the kings, the Roman Republic, the Roman Empire, the “Byzantine” Empire, and by some measures the Holy Roman Empire.

There have not only been many technological advances in recent history, but also great social advances. Our goal is to look back to classic Rome while also integrating modern advancements.

Has someone already proclaimed them self Emperor?

No. This movement is a serious attempt at rebuilding the Roman government. We reject delusional, self-declared, claims to the title of emperor.

What happens if this campaign doesn’t reach its goal?

If the campaign doesn’t reach its goal, the money will be used to accomplish as much of our goal as possible. Your money will be used to the fullest extent to make a modern Roman government a reality.

When will perks be delivered?

All digital perks will be fulfilled within 1-2 days. All physical perks will be fulfilled after the campaign has finished and funding has been received.

Is this project open to people all over the world?

Yes. This project is for people all over the world. We have members in Europe, the United States, and other places.

Ancient Roman citizenry included people from a wide variety of ethnicities. We continue this today by keeping membership open to people everywhere.

Is this legal?

Forming a new nation is something that is a complex process. Most countries today were formed by breaking away from a mother country. Is it legal for a new nation to break away from their mother country? Certainly, the new nation and the mother country would have differing views.

However, our goal is not to rebuild Rome through separation which could be deemed illegal. Instead our goal is to gather popular support for the unification of existing nations. We want to see a peaceful unification of European nations to rebuild Rome. So, yes, our effort are legal.

Why would a country want to leave the EU and join a Roman government?

We carry no delusions that nations will clamor to join us. Clearly, in the early stages there is no reason for any existing government to join this movement. This is expected, and our plan takes this into account. However, major changes usually come from small beginnings. As the people behind the Roman movement grow in numbers, our economy increases in strength, and political activism spreads; uniting with Rome will become a more attractive and viable option.
story_txt:
Restituamus Imperium!

What is This?Founded 2,700 years ago, Rome grew to
become one of the most influential civilizations of all time. They left a
legal, linguistic, and philosophical legacy that remains with us today. The
ruins of roman cities inspire the imagination of all who see them. Most
civilizations today owe their very existence to ancient Rome. The loss of ancient Roman society is a tragedy and that is why we are working to rebuild it
in modern times.
Today, Europe and the world are in economic and political
turmoil. A rebuilt Rome can bring stabilization to the region. It will be able
to bring jobs and progress. But we need your help to make this dream a reality.
Join us as we rebuild this once great civilization and
restore it to its former glory.
Plan of Action
Rebuilding ancient Rome is not some impossible dream. With
the proper planning and participation it can be accomplished and in a short
time. You are probably questioning how Rome can be rebuilt. Let's give you the answer:
Phase 1 – A Voice For Change
The first phase of this project will involve laying the
foundation for the movement that will rebuild Rome. We have no false notions that this movement will become popular
overnight. It will start small and take great effort to grow.
The first part of this project will involve establishing
both online and real world groups of supporters. We will hold online and real
world meetings where we will seek solutions for local problems, strengthen each
other, and advocate change.
We will also be establishing the foundation for the Roman
Economy. This will include the minting of Roman coinage which will be made of
valuable metals. These will serve to back paper and digital currency. There will also be an online currency system established so
that members can buy and sell using Roman money.
Additionally we will support humanitarian projects and
charities under the name of Rome. Our primary goal is to positively change
lives and we want to start this from the very beginning.
Phase 2 – Realizing Change
The second phase of this project will be devoted to realizing
change in local laws and encouraging Roman citizenship. 
We will be actively advocating citizenship in Rome and will
be using advertisements and local activism to do so. Gatherings of members will
continue and citizens will engage in peaceful rallies and
protests.
Citizens will be active in the political
process. This means that they will not only be advocating change to local
leaders, but also running for political office where able. The change that will be advocated is a simplification of legal processes (decreasing bureaucracy)
and a return to Roman law*.
There will be economic and business investments made during
this time. These will be done to increase the economic power of Roman society.
Charitable projects will continue during this phase as well.
They will be moved more toward Roman-centric projects under Roman run
charities.* We recognize that much social change and progress has taken place since Roman times. We advocate the return to Roman law, but also the revision of those laws to include these changes.
Phase 3 – Political Involvement
The third phase of this project will involve increasing
involvement of political and business leaders in Roman society. It is during
this phase that the Roman movement will be advantageous enough that nations
will take Rome seriously as a viable option.
Political leaders of various countries in Roman territories
will be encouraged to become involved in Rome. In addition to public support
for nations to join with Rome there will be economic and political incentives.
These incentives will be things like: stronger economic alliances, more stable politics, greater influence in global politics. These will bring a push for Roman society on two fronts. Both from the general
populace and from political leaders.
We will also advocate participation in Roman society to business
leaders. There will be incentives given for businesses to get involved in the rebuilding
of Roman civilization. These incentives will include things like business contracts, access to new markets, and and economically stronger customer base.
Why Rome Should be Rebuilt?
Other than the "cool" factor there are many reasons why the
Roman civilization should be rebuilt.
Stable Economy – The European economy is based on fractional
reserve banking. This basically means that money is made up out of thin air. Unsurprisingly
this system is failing. The Roman economy will be built on currency backed by
precious metals. Because precious metals have intrinsic value, Roman currency
will be much stronger than the Euro.
Simplified Government – As time goes on and legal decisions
are made, the laws of a nation becomes cumbersome. Just as Justinian reformed and streamlined
the legal code; we too will cut away the dead weight and excess bureaucracy. We
will institute a legal code based on ancient Roman law modified to meet modern
needs.
Leading Edge of Technology – A rebuilt Rome will advocate
progress in technology and industry. This will create jobs and advances in
communication, energy, medicine, and many other areas.
Stabilize Volatile Regions – There is a great deal of
turmoil in some regions of Europe. A rebuilt Roman civilization will be able to stabilize these
regions through political and economic advances. 
Improve Infrastructure – A rebuilt Rome will be able to
quickly institute advanced infrastructure including transportation and energy. Today
advances are being made in the areas of solar, wind, wave, and other energy
production systems. There will also be developments made in agriculture and self-sufficiency
of communities.
Reduce Cost of Living – With a stronger economy, advanced
infrastructure, and greater self-sufficiency, the cost of living will go down
and quality of life will go up.
Provide Jobs – The opportunities and projects developed by a rebuilt Rome
will bring more jobs. More jobs will in turn boost the economy.
What Do We Need?
To get this movement started we are gathering funds for the
completion of Phase 1. These funds will be is directed at three main projects.
These projects are building the economy, promoting the movement, and charity.*These percentages are based on money after perks are fulfilled.
Build up the Roman Economy – One of the first things we will
do is start building a stable Roman economy. We will be minting Roman coins as
well as opening an online banking system. The coins we will mint will be based
on ancient Roman denominations: Aureus (gold), Solidus (gold), Antoninianus (silver), Denarius (Silver), Quinarius
Argentus (Silver), Sestertius (brass), Dupondis (brass), As (copper), Semis
(bronze), Quadrans (bronze), Uncia (bronze).
Because we live in a digital age our online banking system
will probably be used more than coins. However, the coins will be used as
backing for the digital and paper money system. This will help stabilize the
European economy because, instead of fiat currency, money will be backed
by something that actually has value.To Summarize how we will be using €52.500:- Mint coins- Establish online currency system
Promote the Movement - We will also be using the money to
promote the movement. Information is key to any successful movement.
Supporters are gained as they learn about the benefits a movement will bring.
That is why we will be creating multilingual booklets, flyers, etc. These will
be used to inform people about the rebuilding of the Roman government. This
money will also be used to organize public gatherings.To Summarize how we will be using €22.500:- Print promotional material- Advertisements- Fund meetings and gatherings- Website and hosting
Charity – We want to directly help people in the area of the
ancient Roman government. Half of the money we raise will go directly towards charitable projects, including disaster relief, medical care for children, etc. We
want to help improve the quality of life for people in Roman lands. A public accounting of
this money will be made so you will know exactly where your money
is going.To Summarize how we will be using €75.000:- Provide food for the poor.- Assist impoverished children.- Support community improvement.- Etc.Perks – Some of the money you contribute will go towards providing you with awesome perks. This covers things like purchasing, packaging, shipping, etc. Fulfilling perks is calculated to be approximately 10% of contributions. To reach our funding level we need to add another €15.000 to our total to account for that.  What You Get
Freebies:Join our Facebook Group.Download a free wallpaper:2560x15602048x15361920x10801680x10501600x12001440x9001280x10241280x800800x600640x1136340x960320x480Perks:


Other Ways You Can Help

Do you want to help rebuild Roman society and don’t
have any money to contribute? There are still ways you can help.
Share Our Campaign – Share our campaign with your friends
and followers on social media.
Tell Your Friends and Family – Talk to your friends and
families about our campaign. 
Join Our Online Community – Like our Facebook page and join
our group.FAQ
Who is running this project?
This project is run by a group of European and American
enthusiasts of ancient Rome, who want to see a revitalization of the society
that founded western civilization. We have a variety of experiences and
backgrounds. You can learn more about us and even chat with us on our facebook
group.
Are you serious?
We are very serious. Rebuilding the roman government will be
beneficial to Europe and the world. When established, the roman government will
be able to bring benefits to the area including improved economy, jobs, and
more streamlined government interaction.
Why rebuild the Roman government?
The ancient roman civilization laid the foundation for
modern life. And the restoration of the Roman government would benefit, not only
Europe, but also the world. Ancient Rome is understood to have been a forerunner
in innovation and technology. We can bring these qualities back, and create
innovations that will not only improve the quality of life in Europe, but also
around the world.
Many people falsely believe that the Roman government fell
in 476AD. The truth is history is much more complicated than that. The Roman government continued in the east for another
977 years. Also in 800AD the Pope gave the title of Roman Emperor to
Charlemagne. On that date the roman government was effectively reestablished in
the west.
This Roman government ended only relatively recently, in 1806, when
Francis II abdicated the title of Imperator
Romanorum. This means that over the past 2768 years only 209 of those have
been without a Roman government.
Religiously speaking, Rome has continued to the present day
through the Roman Catholic Church and the Pope, as well as through the Eastern
Orthodox Church.
Anciently people of all varieties of ethnicity were Roman. Thus as an ethnicity, Roman, continues on to this very day through the many inhabitants of
Europe.
In some ways Rome is alive and well in religious and
ethnographic spheres. It is our desire to bring it back in the political realm.
Are you trying to restore a specific era in Roman History?
Yes and no. We look to the classic roman era as a guide.
However, at the same time it would be foolish to ignore developments in recent
history. Rome’s history spans the time of the kings, the Roman Republic, the
Roman Empire, the “Byzantine” Empire, and by some measures the Holy Roman
Empire.
There have not only been many technological advances in
recent history, but also great social advances. Our goal is to look back to
classic Rome while also integrating modern advancements.
Has someone already proclaimed them self Emperor?
No. This movement is a serious attempt at rebuilding the Roman
government. We reject delusional, self-declared, claims to the title of emperor. 
What happens if this campaign doesn’t reach its goal?
If the campaign doesn’t reach its goal, the money will be
used to accomplish as much of our goal as possible. Your money will be used to
the fullest extent to make a modern Roman government a reality.When will perks be delivered?
All digital perks will be fulfilled within 1-2 days. All physical perks will be fulfilled after the campaign has finished and funding has been received.
Is this project open to people all over the world?
Yes. This project is for people all over the world. We have members in Europe, the United States, and other places.
Ancient Roman citizenry included people from a wide variety of ethnicities. We continue this today
by keeping membership open to people everywhere.
Is this legal?
Forming a new nation is something that is a complex process. Most
countries today were formed by breaking away from a mother country. Is it legal
for a new nation to break away from their mother country? Certainly, the new nation
and the mother country would have differing views.
However, our goal is not to rebuild Rome through separation which
could be deemed illegal. Instead our goal is to gather popular support for the
unification of existing nations. We want to see a peaceful unification of European nations to rebuild Rome. So, yes, our effort are legal.
Why would a country want to leave the EU and join a Roman government?
We carry no delusions that nations will clamor to join us. Clearly, in the early stages there is no reason for any existing government to join this movement. This is expected, and our plan takes this into account.
However, major changes usually come from small beginnings. As the people behind
the Roman movement grow in numbers, our economy increases in strength, and political activism spreads; uniting with Rome will become a more attractive and viable option.

story:
I, Trebor C. Worthe Sr., am on a noble quest to write quality stories that will educate and inspire. I have written 3 quality picture books listed below, to be self published and sold at  upcoming children's festivals.

Bless You


Little tissue pleads to sneeze but mother tissue yearns for her child to not make a mess.

Despite their differences, they work together and find out how blessed they really are.

"Little Tissue had a big issue.

MOM! Please! Bless me to SNEEZE!

Boogers! Gook! Eww the mess!

Trust me Tissue, a mother NOSE best!"


Tacocat


An evil olive named Dr. Olive unleashes his latest greatest creation, Tacocat to wreak havoc on the citizens of Wassanassaw.  Filled with humor and palindromes (words spelled forward and backward) readers will learn the importance of subtext.


"Elle, I’ll need the following ingriedents"!"


1 Tahini Hat! 101 Tangy Gnat!

"Wontons?"

 "NOT NOW, HANNAH!" Dr. Awkward was biserk.

"No lemon, no melon. Just stressed desserts! Thats it Anna! Nab A Bananna! Now Stir Grits!"

It was a wet stew that started to brew.

"Evil, a sin, is alive!"


I am a Thundercloud


Thundercloud empowers all children including those who are disabled. This book was written to celebrate children’s behavioral differences and teach children to accept their peers. Thundercloud provides an outlet for children by incorporating weather as the central theme. Illustrated by special needs children.


"I am a thunder cloud 

Boom boom pow

I'll say it twice and I'll say it loud!

I am a thunder cloud!

I am a thunder cloud!

Zip zip zap!

Zip zip zap!

I am a lightning bolt,

Zip zip zap!

Don't touch this and don't touch that!

I am a bolt a jolt of the Heebie jeebies,

"I can't help it I'm just me!"


Here's where your money will help:


316.00 25 copies of 3 children's books through Createspace.com

99.00 SCWBI one year membership fee 

35.00 Collingswood Book Festival Vendor Fee (October 3rd, 2015)

50.00 for promotional materials


Percentages of your donation will provide scholarships for campers who attend Camp Winnarainbow, a performing arts camp for disadvantaged youth.


Together we can make this goal a reality. Bless you for your time, heart and donation!

story:
Short Summary

  • Rabbi Morey Schwartz, former congregational rabbi in the U.S., living in Israel since 2000.
  • There is a great demand for a book like this in Hebrew.
  • Contributors will enable me to translate the book and publish it.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need $5000 to complete the translation and publish the first 1,000 copies of my book, "Where's My Miracle?"
  • I will offer a lecture and an autographing book session to donors of $1,000 or more.

The Impact

  • This translation will open the eyes of thousands of Israelis who are seeking understanding.
  • The book will serve to inspire and comfort..

Risks & Challenges

  • I am hopeful that donors will realize the significance of this campaign, the crisis in faith that needs to be addressed.
  • This book could serve as a springboard for discussion nationwide.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this TODAY on your facebook page.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Message from Rennie and Eleana

First, we just want to thank you for taking the time to stop by my Indiegogo campaign page. Myself along with my Daughter, Eleana Curran, created this children's book and hope that you will take a minute to further explore my campaign initiative.  You will soon understand that this is bigger than just a book. Bigger than you. Bigger than me. This is about inspiring and encouraging children to chase their dreams and to help them realize that they are special as long as they believe.

This is about providing much needed motivational resources to our children both in the United States and abroad. Should you graciously decide to make a donation, I would like to personally thank you for not just your financial contribution, but more importantly for joining our cause and helping to touch the lives of so many!

Blessings,
Rennie and Eleana Curran 
Philippians 4:13

What We Need & What You Get

  • Publishing Cost 
  • Printing Cost for the book 
  • Marketing for the book
  • Book launch event
  • Extra copies to give out during school visits

Our Big Mission

The Children's Book Campaign has been created to promote positive behavior, literacy, and encouragement to children across the world. Since releasing his first book entitled "Free Agent" in 2013, author Rennie Curran has focused his efforts on using his platform as a former professional athlete and speaker to inspire different groups of people. Through the campaigning efforts, Curran hopes that this book will help inspire many children who are striving to achieve their dreams in life. 

Join the cause by selecting one of our donation options & help Rennie share his book today! 

 

Our Campaign Goal

We are seeking to raise $5,000 through this campaign. This will enable us to finish the process of publishing Rennie's inspiring book and get copies into the hands of those unable to afford it. The official launch will be August 3rd. There will be a book launch event in Atlanta, Georgia at the Center For Puppetry Arts that Thursday evening. You can purchase tickets at - starbooklaunch.eventbrite.com

Following the launch, Rennie hopes to engage in mentorship & motivational speaking engagements throughout the United States. 

Children who read well do better in other subjects, and in all aspects of school and beyond.

Reading skills correspond directly to one’s ability to…
– be an informed citizen
– communicate effectively
– earn a higher salary
– succeed in one’s chosen career, and
– achieve personal fulfillment


 Literary readers are:
–  3 times as likely to attend a performing arts event
–  4 times as likely to visit an art museum
–  2 1/2 times as likely to do volunteer or charity work
–  1 1/2 times as likely to attend sporting events, and
–  1 ½ times as likely to participate in sports activities.

Children who have not developed some basic literacy skills by the time they enter school are 3 – 4 times more likely to drop out in later years.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. Share it on your social media feed using the Indiegogo sharing tools. 
  • Book Rennie to come and speak to your school - www.renniecurran.com
  • Get your organization to become a sponsor

story:
Have you ever wondered if you have an alter ego? By learning other languages you can find a new identity, but what about a new personality?

If you already speak a few languages, you might have noticed this for yourself.

Fortunately, that doesn’t mean you’ll end up like the case of The Mind of Billy Milligan – the first person to ever be diagnosed with multiple personality disorder.

So, what does it mean?

Speaking a New Language is a Lot Like Being an Actor

I used to play in the theatre when I was in high school, still being a sad monolingual person. That is when I discovered that I had to observe people in order to play a particular character.

When I was 15 I faced a hard choice. I was so emotionally involved in theatre that I gave serious thought to entering the Academy of Theatre in Moscow. However, my plans were confronted by my parents who couldn’t imagine their daughter acting on the stage. In my turn I was utterly opposed to entering a standard university as I had very vivid images of teachers who despite being called teachers couldn’t add any value beyond the curriculum...

The aftermath of my vigorous dispute with the parents was taking the entrance exams to Moscow State Linguistic University.... and there during my modules on inter-cultural communication and the history of linguistics that I discovered my passion for languages, cultures and communication.

Let’s look at the theory of how that works…

The Language You Speak Influences How You View the World

Friedrich von Humboldt states that our worldview reflects our language and culture. Speaking a foreign language gives you a new perspective and allows you to see the world from another point of view.

Another linguist V. I . Malakhov states that our reasoning and superstitions are determined by the language we think in.

There are already neurolinguistic studies proving that the structure of the language matters and really influences the way we think. The latest comparison between English and German grammar structures has shown this. We use vocabulary to describe the world around us. And quite often a dress is white and gold for us, when it’s blue and black for our friend. While we can’t change our physical vision settings, we can change our thoughts and then our vision.

Think about your native language, your culture, your social environment – are you superstitious about number 4 if you weren’t born in Asia? Have you become more sensitive towards this number if you happened to learn Mandarin or Japanese?

Another pair of great linguists Edward Sapir and Benjamin Lee Whorf investigated the question of linguistic relativity. Notably they addressed the “mystique of the language”. They believed that the language reflects the fundamental values of the given culture and at the same time forms them. Living in big cities you may notice a gap between your system of values and of your neighbours. And when you learn a new language you may experience a contradiction with your own values when you dive deep into a new culture. So, what to do?

At the time of my discovery of academia I spoke Russian, English and Spanish. After going to Europe, I noticed the difference between opinions and values of different nations and cultures. Especially, I noticed how they each had different impressions and perceptions... 

(I wrote this article as a guest post while writing my book a few months ago...)


The Impact

This book is based on my scientific research and my teenage dream of opening a language school - now realised in Amolingua. 

I've given a lecture on my scientific work at New York University, Moscow State University and University of Edinburgh and giving a TEDx talk at the University of Saint Andrews at the end of April. 


This piece is a combination of my scientific research and practical experience around the world during my work at G20, EUDC, WUDC, WMC, EU Commission, NATO-RNC, Council of Europe together with meetings with entrepreneurs, investors and finance people around the globe. 

This particular field of study is still emerging as it combines linguistics, cross-cultural communication, socio-cultural anthropology, behavioural economics, experimental psychology, neurolinguistics, etc. And we need to develop it and raise the cultural awareness to succeed in our communication on a international level.

This book is the first milestone on the way to a better understanding between diverse parties in professional spheres around the globe. 

My mission is to enable people to enjoy cultural diversity, and this book together with my school and other projects is just a mere part of international initiatives trying to bridge people from diverse cultural societies and help them to work in teams, succeeding in their business, collaborating and building their dreams together.


What You Get When You Help Us

The funds to be raised are aimed to finance the professional services required to build a great layout for both the e-book and paper version of the book. These professional services will be hired for the English version of the book. Also, the first copies of the book will be printed. Here below is the split of the financing required according to the different tasks addressed :

The rewarding gifts of the crowdfunding include e-books, first printed copies of the book and consultations on inter-cultural communication and barriers.

If the final amount of the crowdfunding is not reached, the funds raised will be allocated to each single item of the whole project that can be financed : the e-book, ISBN, cover, design, paper book.

If we manage to collect even more funds, we are willing to translate this book into Spanish, Russian, Chinese and German! 


Risks & Challenges

The main challenge now is to let the maximum number of persons know about the existence of the book. It’s the only way to reach the target amount of this crowdfunding, and to go beyond… let’s be ambitious ! This can only be achieved thanks to you sharing the news about this campaign. On our side, we have contacted press and influencers who care about cultural diversity and education, so that this initiative be spread beyond our close circles.

Fortunately, that doesn’t mean you’ll end up like the case of The Mind of Billy Milligan – the first person to ever be diagnosed with multiple personality disorder.
So, what does it mean?
Speaking a New Language is a Lot Like Being an Actor
I used to play in the theatre when I was in high school, still being a sad monolingual person. That is when I discovered that I had to observe people in order to play a particular character.
When I was 15 I faced a hard choice. I was so emotionally involved in theatre that I gave serious thought to entering the Academy of Theatre in Moscow. However, my plans were confronted by my parents who couldn’t imagine their daughter acting on the stage. In my turn I was utterly opposed to entering a standard university as I had very vivid images of teachers who despite being called teachers couldn’t add any value beyond the curriculum...
The aftermath of my vigorous dispute with the parents was taking the entrance exams to Moscow State Linguistic University.... and there during my modules on inter-cultural communication and the history of linguistics that I discovered my passion for languages, cultures and communication.
Let’s look at the theory of how that works…
The Language You Speak Influences How You View the World
Friedrich von Humboldt states that our worldview reflects our language and culture. Speaking a foreign language gives you a new perspective and allows you to see the world from another point of view.
Another linguist V. I . Malakhov states that our reasoning and superstitions are determined by the language we think in.
There are already neurolinguistic studies proving that the structure of the language matters and really influences the way we think. The latest comparison between English and German grammar structures has shown this. We use vocabulary to describe the world around us. And quite often a dress is white and gold for us, when it’s blue and black for our friend. While we can’t change our physical vision settings, we can change our thoughts and then our vision.
Think about your native language, your culture, your social environment – are you superstitious about number 4 if you weren’t born in Asia? Have you become more sensitive towards this number if you happened to learn Mandarin or Japanese?
Another pair of great linguists Edward Sapir and Benjamin Lee Whorf investigated the question of linguistic relativity. Notably they addressed the “mystique of the language”. They believed that the language reflects the fundamental values of the given culture and at the same time forms them. Living in big cities you may notice a gap between your system of values and of your neighbours. And when you learn a new language you may experience a contradiction with your own values when you dive deep into a new culture. So, what to do?
At the time of my discovery of academia I spoke Russian, English and Spanish. After going to Europe, I noticed the difference between opinions and values of different nations and cultures. Especially, I noticed how they each had different impressions and perceptions... 
(I wrote this article as a guest post while writing my book a few months ago...)

The Impact
This book is based on my scientific research and my teenage dream of opening a language school - now realised in Amolingua. 
I've given a lecture on my scientific work at New York University, Moscow State University and University of Edinburgh and giving a TEDx talk at the University of Saint Andrews at the end of April. 



This piece is a combination of my scientific research and practical experience around the world during my work at G20, EUDC, WUDC, WMC, EU Commission, NATO-RNC, Council of Europe together with meetings with entrepreneurs, investors and finance people around the globe. 
This particular field of study is still emerging as it combines linguistics, cross-cultural communication, socio-cultural anthropology, behavioural economics, experimental psychology, neurolinguistics, etc. And we need to develop it and raise the cultural awareness to succeed in our communication on a international level.
This book is the first milestone on the way to a better understanding between diverse parties in professional spheres around the globe. 
My mission is to enable people to enjoy cultural diversity, and this book together with my school and other projects is just a mere part of international initiatives trying to bridge people from diverse cultural societies and help them to work in teams, succeeding in their business, collaborating and building their dreams together.



What You Get When You Help Us
The funds to be raised are aimed to finance the professional services required to build a great layout for both the e-book and paper version of the book. These professional services will be hired for the English version of the book. Also, the first copies of the book will be printed. Here below is the split of the financing required according to the different tasks addressed :
The rewarding gifts of the crowdfunding include e-books, first printed copies of the book and consultations on inter-cultural communication and barriers.
If the final amount of the crowdfunding is not reached, the funds raised will be allocated to each single item of the whole project that can be financed : the e-book, ISBN, cover, design, paper book.
If we manage to collect even more funds, we are willing to translate this book into Spanish, Russian, Chinese and German! 


    Risks & Challenges The main challenge now is to let the maximum number of persons know about the existence of the book. It’s the only way to reach the target amount of this crowdfunding, and to go beyond… let’s be ambitious ! This can only be achieved thanks to you sharing the news about this campaign. On our side, we have contacted press and influencers who care about cultural diversity and education, so that this initiative be spread beyond our close circles.

story:
http://www.amazon.com/-/e/B007V6VOHO

I have been in a love affair with penning poetry and prose since I was a child, however, as an adult I put my love on hold to pursue God’s calling on my life. I have no regrets, because my 22 years of ministry has been astonishing and fulfilling.  At age 48, I sat down at my computer and poured myself into my first novel,Thicker Than Blood, for over a year and a half.  Thicker Than Blood  has had amazing success, garnering me a nomination in 2013 for Female Author Of the Year from Oosa Book Club’sAll Things Literary Awards. Since it went on sale on Amazon it has received no less than 4 out of 5 stars, and many readers say it definitely will make a stellar movie! I’m so humbled by the success of this book. It’s unbelievable that my initial self-published project would be read and rated high mostly by people I’ve never met! Please click on the link provided above to read Amazon page and reviews. 

I’m almost finished writing the sequel, Thicker Than Blood II: The Rah-surrection, however this time I want to work on a budget that affords me to travel and promote my work. Writing a novel is only the beginning.  To have it professionally edited, proofread, published and promoted takes funds. When I first published in 2012, I did it on a shoestring budget from my own pocket, and although that was difficult, I persevered. After much research, I found out about crowd funding and read the many stories of success here on Indiegogo.  Please contribute to my future as a successful author. Any amount is appreciated!

All funds here are donated and will go directly into the business account for my company, Mayrann Speaks Productions LLC. My goal is $12, 000. Thank you so much for your kind consideration.

Mary A. Finley

story:
Why are we asking for your money?

If you know anything about Post Mortem Press, you know that we attend a large number of shows each year. We do a great deal of "hand selling", where people from all over the central United States get exposed to our books. The marketplace is a noisy and crowded place and this is how we've managed to rise above the noise.

There are a handful of markets that elude us. Usually because of cost and timing. We've taken some steps on our side with the timing challenges, but that still leaves the cost. We are not asking for you to foot the bill for travel, food, hotel, etc. We are asking that you help us out with three shows in particular; the LA Festival of Books, Southern Festival of Books (Nashville), and Boston Book Fair. These events will place us in front of  a quarter million people or more. But, combined expenses to attend just these three shows is close to $7,000.   This is where you come in. If you can help us out here, we can find new audiences for our authors. The LA Festival of Books is on the campus of USC and is frequented by countless movie and television producers, etc. Imagine that level of exposure. 

What We Need & What You Get

So, we broke down the cost to purchase the exhibitor space at these three events, and that is our target.  Pretty simple. Now, keep in mind, IndieGoGo gets a percentage, the credit card people get a percentage, and of course the perks cost money to produce and ship. So, when all is said and done, we will see about 65% of this money. 

The perks are pretty standard for a book related campaign. You get eBooks, paperback books, hardback books, and more. There's even a few opportunities to find yourself included in the actual story, including Jessica McHugh's eagerly awaited sequel to RABBITS IN THE GARDEN, HARES IN THE HEDGEROW. Or, if Renn Faires and undead skinless bunnies are your thing, you could make a cameo in book three of Josef Matulich's ARCANUM FAIRE series. 

There's also a chance to hang out with the PMP crew at an event, get fed, and leave with an arm full of books and swag! Party with PMP!. 

The Impact

More than anything, we want to get our books in front of more readers. Into new markets. The impact can be as simple as a young reader finds a new author to follow, or a journeyman of the small press game gets noticed by the people in the ivory tower. Bottom line, more unique people means more readers, which means more books.  You are helping your favorite authors grow! 

Risks & Challenges

The risk is minimal here, as every little bit helps. But, we have a plan. 
We selected a flexible funding plan that means we will get some money, even if we don't reach our goal - so don't let that number scare you. We will do this progressively. If we earn enough for one of three, we'll go to that one. If we earn more, we'll attend more events. If we don't earn enough for either of these three, we will still use the money to attend smaller shows we have never attended before. The goal remains the same, broaden the audience for our authors.  Say we can't afford Los Angeles, we may still visit Minneapolis or maybe St Louis, Philadelphia, Baltimore, or DC (sounds like the lyrics to Dancing in the Street) 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, that's okay. Take a moment to share this campaign with your friends and people you know who are readers. Follow us on Twitter, like us on Facebook, you know, all the social media stuff.  Even the smallest effort can help and we are truly grateful.

story:
Résumé du Projet

L'équipe de Stopmensonges va faire un reportage en français sur le plus gros évènement au monde qui rassemble les chercheurs de vérité : CONTACT IN THE DESERT 2018

Les principaux sujets abordés sont la Divulgation Totale de la présence extraterrestre sur Terre et les Programmes Spatiaux Secrets.

Ça se passe du 01 au 04 juin 2018 à Indian Wells (Californie-USA).
Site web : http://contactinthedesert.com
Liste des intervenants : http://contactinthedesert.com/speakers

Nous allons interviewer certains intervenants, assister aux conférences et vous rapporter les infos en Français que nous vous posterons sur stopmensonges.com.

 

Les besoins

Tickets pour les 4 jours : 210 usd par personne en prévente (x 2)

Tickets pour 2 workshop avec David Wilcock : 49 usd (x 2)

Nourriture sur place matin, midi et soir : environ 200 usd pour 4 jours par personne (x 2)

Frais d’hôtel du 31 mai au 05 : 750 usd (hôtel des intervenants)

Location de voiture et essence, aller retour : 400 usd

Achat de tous les DVD des conférences : 300 usd

(nous ne compte pas notre temps de travail sur place et en post-production)

Soit un total de 2170 usd environ auquel il faudra rajouter 400 usd pour qu'Estelle puisse m'accompagner (billet d'avion pour venir aux États Unis depuis le Québec),

Les contreparties

9$ posez vos questions en privé à Laurent sur skype
22$ (dropbox 1) = question à Laurent + un lien privé en avant première de toutes les interview qu'on aura faites + 1 conférence en vidéo au choix
55$ (dropbox 2) = dropbox 1 + 2 vidéos d'une conférence au choix
101$ (dropbox 3) = dropbox 2 + 5 vidéos de conférence au choix
500$ (dropbox 4) = dropbox 3 + 12 vidéos de conférence au choix
1000$ (1 place seulement) = dropbox 4 + assister à CITD sur place avec Estelle et Laurent (hors frais de voyage aux Etats Unis)

 

L'impact

Nous atteignons le point culminant ou tout le barrage est en train de céder, 2018 va être l'année de la Divulgation, donc il ne faut surtout pas rater cet évènement.

 

Risques et défis

Certains des conférenciers sont de véritables stars et sont très difficile a approcher, comme David Wilcock ou Corey Goode. Nous ferons tout mon possible mais je ne peux pas vous garantir a 100% que nous pourrons tous les interviewer.

D'autres façons d'aider

Pensez à partager ce crowdfunding sur vos réseaux sociaux accompagné d'un petit mot d'encouragement à vos lecteurs.

Pensez aussi a vous abonner a notre chaine youtube : www.youtube.com/channel/UCHy8kwF57Kh-YflbJ0WsMoA

Ainsi qu'a notre page FB : www.facebook.com/stopmensongesofficiel

Retrouvez nous sur www.stopmensonges.com

Merci pour votre soutien <3

Namaste

Laurent

story:
*

 

*

A Note from the Publisher:

 

Scott Ploof, Big Easy Magazine's Publisher

 

Hey Y’all,

This is Scott Ploof, Founder and Publisher of Big Easy Magazine, online home for progressive New Orleans. A few months after launching in June 2018, we were named a top 10 news media outlet by Feedspot. Over the last year, we have been reporting on issues that matter to New Orleanians the most such as environmental and socioeconomic injustices, criminal justice reform, charter schools, race, infrastructure and local arts and culture. “Unapologetically Progressive, Uniquely New Orleans” is our official trademark.  

I wanted to share with you guys that Big Easy Magazine is launching a major national fundraising campaign in preparation for Big Easy Magazine 2.0 - right here on IndieGoGo.  For our second year we will publish a quarterly print version of the magazine, and we will focus on expanded art, culture, travel, lifestyle coverage as well as continuing our political and local news coverage.

The $100,000 we are raising now will go towards a complete relaunch of Big Easy Magazine. As a result, we can fill permanent positions, produce more progressive content, conduct more in depth investigative journalism, focus more on the local cultural and arts scene and the things that make New Orleans unique, and hire a marketing director to promote brand awareness nationwide.  With your help, after the 2.0 launch, we can become a self-sustaining voice for progressive New Orleans for years to come.

New Orleans is a cultural icon of the world, and her people make her unique. We come from all walks of life, and despite our unique challenges, we continue to celebrate the diversity of life while pushing the human race forward. Big Easy Magazine 2.0 will truly capture the essence of our people - and together, we will continue making this city a better place to live, visit and work. 

Check out the great perks, donate, and share the link to this campaign.  And thank you from the bottom of my heart for becoming a part of our upcoming 2nd year of celebrating New Orleans and promoting progressive ideals.  Feel free to contact me with any questions and suggestions.  Thanks again.

- Scott
 

*

From our site, past work - from Year 1:

Our past editions:

*

We have great film coverage!

*

It's always  a good time for French Toast!

*

Lots of lifestyle coverage will be happening in Year 2!

*

*

We will expand our food coverage for Year 2!

 

*

MORE PERKS, INFO - PICS, VIDEOS, NOTES COMING SOON!

*

THANK YOU FOR THE SUPPORT!
